   - No exceptions thrown

## Invariants

1. All IDs in responses are valid (non-empty, proper format)
2. Timestamps in responses are valid DateTimes
3. Arrays in responses maintain ordering from server
4. All required fields are present in responses

-}

module API.Types 
  ( APIError(..)
  , APIResult
  -- JSON types
  , ConversationJSON
  , MessageJSON
  , LeafJSON
  , MessageVersionJSON
  -- Conversation endpoints
  , ListConversationsResponse
  , CreateConversationRequest
  , CreateConversationResponse
  , GetConversationResponse
  , UpdateConversationRequest
  , UpdateConversationResponse
  , DeleteConversationResponse
  -- Message endpoints
  , GetMessagesResponse
  , AddMessageRequest
  , AddMessageResponse
  , UpdateMessageRequest
  , UpdateMessageResponse
  , DeleteMessageResponse
  -- Branch endpoints
  , GetLeavesResponse
  , CreateLeafRequest
  , CreateLeafResponse
  , SwitchLeafRequest
  , SwitchLeafResponse
  , DeleteLeafResponse
  -- WebSocket messages
  , WSMessage(..)
  , WSClientMessage(..)
  , WSServerMessage(..)
  ) where

import Prelude

import Data.Argonaut (class DecodeJson, class EncodeJson, JsonDecodeError(..), decodeJson, encodeJson)
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Data.Conversation (ConversationId, MessageId, ConversationType, Participant)
import Data.Branch (LeafId)
import Data.DateTime.JSON (DateTimeJSON)

-- | Possible API errors
data APIError
  = NetworkError String        -- Connection failed
  | HTTPError Int String        -- HTTP status code + message
  | DecodeError JsonDecodeError -- JSON parsing failed
  | ValidationError String      -- Business logic error

derive instance eqAPIError :: Eq APIError

instance showAPIError :: Show APIError where
  show (NetworkError msg) = "NetworkError: " <> msg
  show (HTTPError code msg) = "HTTPError " <> show code <> ": " <> msg
  show (DecodeError err) = "DecodeError: " <> show err
  show (ValidationError msg) = "ValidationError: " <> msg

-- | Result type for all API calls
type APIResult a = Either APIError a

-- | Response from listing conversations
type ListConversationsResponse = 
  { conversations :: Array ConversationJSON
  , total :: Int
  }

-- JSON version of Conversation with DateTimeJSON
type ConversationJSON = 
  { id :: ConversationId
  , title :: String
  , type :: ConversationType
  , participants :: Array Participant
  , messages :: Array MessageJSON
  , createdAt :: DateTimeJSON
  , updatedAt :: DateTimeJSON
  }

type MessageJSON =
  { id :: MessageId
  , conversationId :: ConversationId
  , authorId :: String
  , content :: String
  , createdAt :: DateTimeJSON
  , editedAt :: Maybe DateTimeJSON
  }

type LeafJSON =
  { id :: LeafId
  , conversationId :: ConversationId
  , name :: String
  , parentMessageId :: Maybe MessageId
  , createdAt :: DateTimeJSON
  , messageVersions :: Array MessageVersionJSON
  }

type MessageVersionJSON =
  { messageId :: MessageId
  , leafId :: LeafId
  , content :: String
  , version :: Int
  }

-- | Request to create a conversation
type CreateConversationRequest =
  { title :: String
  , type :: ConversationType
  , participants :: Array Participant
  }

-- | Response from creating a conversation
type CreateConversationResponse = ConversationJSON

-- | Response from getting a single conversation
type GetConversationResponse = ConversationJSON

-- | Request to update a conversation
type UpdateConversationRequest =
  { title :: Maybe String
  , participants :: Maybe (Array Participant)
  }

-- | Response from updating a conversation
type UpdateConversationResponse = ConversationJSON

-- | Response from deleting a conversation
type DeleteConversationResponse = 
  { success :: Boolean
  , message :: String
  }

-- | Response from getting messages
type GetMessagesResponse =
  { messages :: Array MessageJSON
  , leafId :: LeafId
  , hasMore :: Boolean
  }

-- | Request to add a message
type AddMessageRequest =
  { authorId :: String
  , content :: String
  , leafId :: Maybe LeafId  -- defaults to active leaf
  }

-- | Response from adding a message
type AddMessageResponse = MessageJSON

-- | Request to update a message
type UpdateMessageRequest =
  { content :: String
  , createBranch :: Boolean  -- whether to branch on edit
  }

-- | Response from updating a message
type UpdateMessageResponse = 
  { message :: MessageJSON
  , newLeafId :: Maybe LeafId  -- present if branched
  }

-- | Response from deleting a message
type DeleteMessageResponse =
  { success :: Boolean
  , messagesDeleted :: Int
  }

-- | Response from getting leaves/branches
type GetLeavesResponse =
  { leaves :: Array LeafJSON
  , activeLeafId :: LeafId
  }

-- | Request to create a new leaf/branch
type CreateLeafRequest =
  { name :: String
  , branchFromMessageId :: MessageId
  , newContent :: Maybe String  -- optional new content for the message
  }

-- | Response from creating a leaf
type CreateLeafResponse = LeafJSON

-- | Request to switch active leaf
type SwitchLeafRequest =
  { leafId :: LeafId
  }

-- | Response from switching leaf
type SwitchLeafResponse =
  { activeLeafId :: LeafId
  , messages :: Array MessageJSON
  }

-- | Response from deleting a leaf
type DeleteLeafResponse =
  { success :: Boolean
  , newActiveLeafId :: Maybe LeafId  -- if deleted was active
  }

-- | WebSocket message types
data WSMessage
  = WSClient WSClientMessage
  | WSServer WSServerMessage

-- | Messages from client to server
data WSClientMessage
  = WSConnect ConversationId
  | WSDisconnect
  | WSSendMessage AddMessageRequest
  | WSStartTyping
  | WSStopTyping
  | WSStartEditing MessageId
  | WSStopEditing MessageId
  | WSCursorMove MessageId Int  -- message id and cursor position

derive instance eqWSClientMessage :: Eq WSClientMessage

-- | Messages from server to clients
data WSServerMessage
  = WSConnected 
      { conversationId :: ConversationId
      , activeUsers :: Array String
      }
  | WSMessageBroadcast MessageJSON
  | WSMessageUpdated 
      { messageId :: MessageId
      , content :: String
      , editorId :: String
      }
  | WSMessageDeleted MessageId
  | WSTypingIndicator 
      { userId :: String
      , isTyping :: Boolean
      }
  | WSEditingIndicator
      { userId :: String
      , messageId :: Maybe MessageId  -- Nothing means stopped editing
      }
  | WSUserJoined String
  | WSUserLeft String
  | WSError String
  | WSLeafSwitched LeafId

derive instance eqWSServerMessage :: Eq WSServerMessage

-- | JSON encoding for client messages
instance encodeJsonWSClientMessage :: EncodeJson WSClientMessage where
  encodeJson = case _ of
    WSConnect convId -> 
      "type" := "connect"
      ~> "conversationId" := convId
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSDisconnect ->
      "type" := "disconnect"
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSSendMessage req ->
      "type" := "sendMessage"
      ~> "data" := req
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSStartTyping ->
      "type" := "startTyping"
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSStopTyping ->
      "type" := "stopTyping"
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSStartEditing msgId ->
      "type" := "startEditing"
      ~> "messageId" := msgId
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSStopEditing msgId ->
      "type" := "stopEditing"
      ~> "messageId" := msgId
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSCursorMove msgId pos ->
      "type" := "cursorMove"
      ~> "messageId" := msgId
      ~> "position" := pos
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | JSON decoding for server messages
instance decodeJsonWSServerMessage :: DecodeJson WSServerMessage where
  decodeJson json = do
    obj <- decodeJson json
    msgType <- obj .: "type"
    case msgType of
      "connected" -> do
        data' <- obj .: "data"
        conversationId <- data' .: "conversationId"
        activeUsers <- data' .: "activeUsers"
        pure $ WSConnected { conversationId, activeUsers }
      "messageBroadcast" -> do
        msg <- obj .: "data"
        pure $ WSMessageBroadcast msg
      "messageUpdated" -> do
        data' <- obj .: "data"
        messageId <- data' .: "messageId"
        content <- data' .: "content"
        editorId <- data' .: "editorId"
        pure $ WSMessageUpdated { messageId, content, editorId }
      "messageDeleted" -> do
        msgId <- obj .: "messageId"
        pure $ WSMessageDeleted msgId
      "typingIndicator" -> do
        data' <- obj .: "data"
        userId <- data' .: "userId"
        isTyping <- data' .: "isTyping"
        pure $ WSTypingIndicator { userId, isTyping }
      "editingIndicator" -> do
        data' <- obj .: "data"
        userId <- data' .: "userId"
        messageId <- data' .: "messageId"
        pure $ WSEditingIndicator { userId, messageId }
      "userJoined" -> do
        userId <- obj .: "userId"
        pure $ WSUserJoined userId
      "userLeft" -> do
        userId <- obj .: "userId"
        pure $ WSUserLeft userId
      "error" -> do
        message <- obj .: "message"
        pure $ WSError message
      "leafSwitched" -> do
        leafId <- obj .: "leafId"
        pure $ WSLeafSwitched leafId
      _ -> Left $ TypeMismatch $ "Unknown WebSocket message type: " <> msgType

toolUseResult.originalFile:
{-|
Module: API.WebSocket

WebSocket client for real-time communication.

## Architecture

WebSocket connection state machine:
- Disconnected -> Connecting (on connect)
- Connecting -> Connected (on open)
- Connected -> Disconnected (on close/error)
- Connected -> Reconnecting (on unexpected close)
- Reconnecting -> Connected (on successful reconnect)

## Protocol

Messages follow the WSMessage type from API.Types:
- Client sends WSClientMessage
- Server sends WSServerMessage
- All messages are JSON encoded

-}

module API.WebSocket
  ( WSConnection
  , WSConfig
  , defaultWSConfig
  , connect
  , disconnect
  , send
  , onMessage
  , getState
  , ConnectionState(..)
  ) where

import Prelude

import Control.Monad.Except (runExcept)
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..), fromJust)
import Data.Int (fromNumber)
import Data.Traversable (traverse_)
import Effect (Effect)
import Effect.Aff (Aff, makeAff, nonCanceler, delay)
import Effect.Class (liftEffect)
import Effect.Ref as Ref
import Effect.Timer (setInterval, clearInterval, IntervalId)
import Foreign (Foreign, unsafeToForeign)
import Data.Time.Duration (Milliseconds(..))
import Partial.Unsafe (unsafePartial)
import Web.Event.EventTarget (addEventListener, eventListener, removeEventListener)
import Web.Socket.WebSocket as WS
import Web.Socket.Event.MessageEvent as ME
import Web.Socket.Event.EventTypes as ET
import Web.Socket.ReadyState as ReadyState
import Web.Socket.ReadyState (ReadyState)

import Data.Argonaut (decodeJson, encodeJson, stringify, parseJson)
import Data.Conversation (ConversationId, unConversationId)
import API.Types (WSClientMessage(..), WSServerMessage(..))

-- | WebSocket connection state
data ConnectionState
  = Disconnected
  | Connecting
  | Connected
  | Reconnecting

derive instance eqConnectionState :: Eq ConnectionState

-- | WebSocket connection handle
type WSConnection =
  { socket :: Ref.Ref (Maybe WS.WebSocket)
  , state :: Ref.Ref ConnectionState
  , config :: WSConfig
  , handlers :: Ref.Ref (Array (WSServerMessage -> Effect Unit))
  , reconnectTimer :: Ref.Ref (Maybe IntervalId)
  }

-- | WebSocket configuration
type WSConfig =
  { baseUrl :: String
  , reconnectDelay :: Milliseconds
  , maxReconnectAttempts :: Int
  , debug :: Boolean
  }

-- | Default WebSocket configuration
defaultWSConfig :: WSConfig
defaultWSConfig =
  { baseUrl: "ws://localhost:8000"
  , reconnectDelay: Milliseconds 3000.0
  , maxReconnectAttempts: 10
  , debug: false
  }

-- | Connect to a conversation via WebSocket
connect :: WSConfig -> ConversationId -> Aff WSConnection
connect config convId = makeAff \callback -> do
  -- Initialize refs
  socketRef <- Ref.new Nothing
  stateRef <- Ref.new Connecting
  handlersRef <- Ref.new []
  reconnectTimerRef <- Ref.new Nothing
  
  let conn = 
        { socket: socketRef
        , state: stateRef
        , config: config
        , handlers: handlersRef
        , reconnectTimer: reconnectTimerRef
        }
  
  -- Create WebSocket
  let url = config.baseUrl <> "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/ws"
  ws <- WS.create url []
  
  -- Set up event handlers
  openListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
    when config.debug $ liftEffect $ WS.sendString ws (stringify $ encodeJson $ WSConnect convId)
    Ref.write Connected stateRef
    Ref.write (Just ws) socketRef
    callback $ Right conn
  
  messageListener <- eventListener \event -> do
    case ME.fromEvent event of
      Nothing -> pure unit
      Just msgEvent -> do
        let msgData = ME.data_ msgEvent
        case parseJson (unsafeToForeign msgData) >>= decodeJson of
          Left _ -> pure unit
          Right serverMsg -> do
            handlers <- Ref.read handlersRef
            traverse_ (\h -> h serverMsg) handlers
  
  closeListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
    currentState <- Ref.read stateRef
    case currentState of
      Connected -> do
        -- Unexpected close, attempt reconnection
        Ref.write Reconnecting stateRef
        Ref.write Nothing socketRef
        liftEffect $ attemptReconnect conn convId 0
      _ -> do
        -- Expected close (user initiated or during connection)
        Ref.write Disconnected stateRef
        Ref.write Nothing socketRef
  
  errorListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
    Ref.write Disconnected stateRef
    Ref.write Nothing socketRef
  
  -- Add listeners
  let target = WS.toEventTarget ws
  addEventListener ET.onOpen openListener false target
  addEventListener ET.onMessage messageListener false target
  addEventListener ET.onClose closeListener false target
  addEventListener ET.onError errorListener false target
  
  pure nonCanceler

-- | Disconnect from WebSocket
disconnect :: WSConnection -> Effect Unit
disconnect conn = do
  maybeWs <- Ref.read conn.socket
  case maybeWs of
    Nothing -> pure unit
    Just ws -> do
      WS.close ws
      Ref.write Nothing conn.socket
      Ref.write Disconnected conn.state
  
  -- Clear reconnect timer if any
  maybeTimer <- Ref.read conn.reconnectTimer
  case maybeTimer of
    Nothing -> pure unit
    Just timerId -> do
      clearInterval timerId
      Ref.write Nothing conn.reconnectTimer

-- | Send a message through WebSocket
send :: WSConnection -> WSClientMessage -> Effect Unit
send conn msg = do
  maybeWs <- Ref.read conn.socket
  case maybeWs of
    Nothing -> pure unit
    Just ws -> do
      state <- WS.readyState ws
      case state of
        ReadyState.Open -> WS.sendString ws (stringify $ encodeJson msg)
        _ -> pure unit

-- | Register a message handler
onMessage :: WSConnection -> (WSServerMessage -> Effect Unit) -> Effect Unit
onMessage conn handler = do
  Ref.modify_ (\handlers -> handlers <> [handler]) conn.handlers

-- | Get current connection state
getState :: WSConnection -> Effect ConnectionState
getState conn = Ref.read conn.state

-- | Attempt to reconnect to WebSocket
attemptReconnect :: WSConnection -> ConversationId -> Int -> Effect Unit
attemptReconnect conn convId attemptNum = do
  when (attemptNum < conn.config.maxReconnectAttempts) do
    -- Clear any existing timer
    maybeTimer <- Ref.read conn.reconnectTimer
    case maybeTimer of
      Just timerId -> clearInterval timerId
      Nothing -> pure unit
    
    -- Set up reconnect timer
    timerId <- setInterval (toNumber $ unwrap conn.config.reconnectDelay) do
      state <- Ref.read conn.state
      case state of
        Reconnecting -> do
          -- Try to reconnect
          let url = conn.config.baseUrl <> "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/ws"
          ws <- WS.create url []
          
          -- Set up handlers for reconnection attempt
          reconnectOpenListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
            Ref.write Connected conn.state
            Ref.write (Just ws) conn.socket
            -- Clear the reconnect timer
            maybeTimer' <- Ref.read conn.reconnectTimer
            case maybeTimer' of
              Just tid -> clearInterval tid
              Nothing -> pure unit
            Ref.write Nothing conn.reconnectTimer
            when conn.config.debug $ 
              liftEffect $ WS.sendString ws (stringify $ encodeJson $ WSConnect convId)
          
          reconnectCloseListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
            -- Reconnection failed, try again
            attemptReconnect conn convId (attemptNum + 1)
          
          let target = WS.toEventTarget ws
          addEventListener ET.onOpen reconnectOpenListener false target
          addEventListener ET.onClose reconnectCloseListener false target
          
        _ -> do
          -- State changed, cancel reconnection
          maybeTimer' <- Ref.read conn.reconnectTimer
          case maybeTimer' of
            Just tid -> clearInterval tid
            Nothing -> pure unit
          Ref.write Nothing conn.reconnectTimer
    
    Ref.write (Just timerId) conn.reconnectTimer
  where
    unwrap (Milliseconds ms) = ms
    toNumber :: Number -> Int
    toNumber n = unsafePartial $ fromJust $ fromNumber n

toolUseResult.originalFile:
{-|
Module: API.WebSocket

WebSocket client for real-time communication.

## Architecture

WebSocket connection state machine:
- Disconnected -> Connecting (on connect)
- Connecting -> Connected (on open)
- Connected -> Disconnected (on close/error)
- Connected -> Reconnecting (on unexpected close)
- Reconnecting -> Connected (on successful reconnect)

## Protocol

Messages follow the WSMessage type from API.Types:
- Client sends WSClientMessage
- Server sends WSServerMessage
- All messages are JSON encoded

-}

module API.WebSocket
  ( WSConnection
  , WSConfig
  , defaultWSConfig
  , connect
  , disconnect
  , send
  , onMessage
  , getState
  , ConnectionState(..)
  ) where

import Prelude

import Control.Monad.Except (runExcept)
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..), fromJust)
import Data.Int (fromNumber)
import Data.Traversable (traverse_)
import Effect (Effect)
import Effect.Aff (Aff, makeAff, nonCanceler, delay)
import Effect.Class (liftEffect)
import Effect.Ref as Ref
import Effect.Timer (setInterval, clearInterval, IntervalId)
import Foreign (Foreign, unsafeToForeign)
import Data.Time.Duration (Milliseconds(..))
import Partial.Unsafe (unsafePartial)
import Web.Event.EventTarget (addEventListener, eventListener, removeEventListener)
import Web.Socket.WebSocket as WS
import Web.Socket.Event.MessageEvent as ME
import Web.Socket.Event.EventTypes as ET
import Web.Socket.ReadyState as ReadyState
import Web.Socket.ReadyState (ReadyState)

import Data.Argonaut (decodeJson, encodeJson, stringify, parseJson)
import Data.Conversation (ConversationId, unConversationId)
import API.Types (WSClientMessage(..), WSServerMessage(..))

-- | WebSocket connection state
data ConnectionState
  = Disconnected
  | Connecting
  | Connected
  | Reconnecting

derive instance eqConnectionState :: Eq ConnectionState

-- | WebSocket connection handle
type WSConnection =
  { socket :: Ref.Ref (Maybe WS.WebSocket)
  , state :: Ref.Ref ConnectionState
  , config :: WSConfig
  , handlers :: Ref.Ref (Array (WSServerMessage -> Effect Unit))
  , reconnectTimer :: Ref.Ref (Maybe IntervalId)
  }

-- | WebSocket configuration
type WSConfig =
  { baseUrl :: String
  , reconnectDelay :: Milliseconds
  , maxReconnectAttempts :: Int
  , debug :: Boolean
  }

-- | Default WebSocket configuration
defaultWSConfig :: WSConfig
defaultWSConfig =
  { baseUrl: "ws://localhost:8000"
  , reconnectDelay: Milliseconds 3000.0
  , maxReconnectAttempts: 10
  , debug: false
  }

-- | Connect to a conversation via WebSocket
connect :: WSConfig -> ConversationId -> Aff WSConnection
connect config convId = makeAff \callback -> do
  -- Initialize refs
  socketRef <- Ref.new Nothing
  stateRef <- Ref.new Connecting
  handlersRef <- Ref.new []
  reconnectTimerRef <- Ref.new Nothing
  
  let conn = 
        { socket: socketRef
        , state: stateRef
        , config: config
        , handlers: handlersRef
        , reconnectTimer: reconnectTimerRef
        }
  
  -- Create WebSocket
  let url = config.baseUrl <> "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/ws"
  ws <- WS.create url []
  
  -- Set up event handlers
  openListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
    when config.debug $ liftEffect $ WS.sendString ws (stringify $ encodeJson $ WSConnect convId)
    Ref.write Connected stateRef
    Ref.write (Just ws) socketRef
    callback $ Right conn
  
  messageListener <- eventListener \event -> do
    case ME.fromEvent event of
      Nothing -> pure unit
      Just msgEvent -> do
        let msgData = ME.data_ msgEvent
        -- msgData is a Foreign value from the WebSocket message
        case runExcept (readString msgData) of
          Left _ -> pure unit
          Right msgStr -> 
            case parseJson msgStr >>= decodeJson of
              Left _ -> pure unit
              Right serverMsg -> do
                handlers <- Ref.read handlersRef
                traverse_ (\h -> h serverMsg) handlers
  
  closeListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
    currentState <- Ref.read stateRef
    case currentState of
      Connected -> do
        -- Unexpected close, attempt reconnection
        Ref.write Reconnecting stateRef
        Ref.write Nothing socketRef
        liftEffect $ attemptReconnect conn convId 0
      _ -> do
        -- Expected close (user initiated or during connection)
        Ref.write Disconnected stateRef
        Ref.write Nothing socketRef
  
  errorListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
    Ref.write Disconnected stateRef
    Ref.write Nothing socketRef
  
  -- Add listeners
  let target = WS.toEventTarget ws
  addEventListener ET.onOpen openListener false target
  addEventListener ET.onMessage messageListener false target
  addEventListener ET.onClose closeListener false target
  addEventListener ET.onError errorListener false target
  
  pure nonCanceler

-- | Disconnect from WebSocket
disconnect :: WSConnection -> Effect Unit
disconnect conn = do
  maybeWs <- Ref.read conn.socket
  case maybeWs of
    Nothing -> pure unit
    Just ws -> do
      WS.close ws
      Ref.write Nothing conn.socket
      Ref.write Disconnected conn.state
  
  -- Clear reconnect timer if any
  maybeTimer <- Ref.read conn.reconnectTimer
  case maybeTimer of
    Nothing -> pure unit
    Just timerId -> do
      clearInterval timerId
      Ref.write Nothing conn.reconnectTimer

-- | Send a message through WebSocket
send :: WSConnection -> WSClientMessage -> Effect Unit
send conn msg = do
  maybeWs <- Ref.read conn.socket
  case maybeWs of
    Nothing -> pure unit
    Just ws -> do
      state <- WS.readyState ws
      case state of
        ReadyState.Open -> WS.sendString ws (stringify $ encodeJson msg)
        _ -> pure unit

-- | Register a message handler
onMessage :: WSConnection -> (WSServerMessage -> Effect Unit) -> Effect Unit
onMessage conn handler = do
  Ref.modify_ (\handlers -> handlers <> [handler]) conn.handlers

-- | Get current connection state
getState :: WSConnection -> Effect ConnectionState
getState conn = Ref.read conn.state

-- | Attempt to reconnect to WebSocket
attemptReconnect :: WSConnection -> ConversationId -> Int -> Effect Unit
attemptReconnect conn convId attemptNum = do
  when (attemptNum < conn.config.maxReconnectAttempts) do
    -- Clear any existing timer
    maybeTimer <- Ref.read conn.reconnectTimer
    case maybeTimer of
      Just timerId -> clearInterval timerId
      Nothing -> pure unit
    
    -- Set up reconnect timer
    timerId <- setInterval (toNumber $ unwrap conn.config.reconnectDelay) do
      state <- Ref.read conn.state
      case state of
        Reconnecting -> do
          -- Try to reconnect
          let url = conn.config.baseUrl <> "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/ws"
          ws <- WS.create url []
          
          -- Set up handlers for reconnection attempt
          reconnectOpenListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
            Ref.write Connected conn.state
            Ref.write (Just ws) conn.socket
            -- Clear the reconnect timer
            maybeTimer' <- Ref.read conn.reconnectTimer
            case maybeTimer' of
              Just tid -> clearInterval tid
              Nothing -> pure unit
            Ref.write Nothing conn.reconnectTimer
            when conn.config.debug $ 
              liftEffect $ WS.sendString ws (stringify $ encodeJson $ WSConnect convId)
          
          reconnectCloseListener <- eventListener \_ -> do
            -- Reconnection failed, try again
            attemptReconnect conn convId (attemptNum + 1)
          
          let target = WS.toEventTarget ws
          addEventListener ET.onOpen reconnectOpenListener false target
          addEventListener ET.onClose reconnectCloseListener false target
          
        _ -> do
          -- State changed, cancel reconnection
          maybeTimer' <- Ref.read conn.reconnectTimer
          case maybeTimer' of
            Just tid -> clearInterval tid
            Nothing -> pure unit
          Ref.write Nothing conn.reconnectTimer
    
    Ref.write (Just timerId) conn.reconnectTimer
  where
    unwrap (Milliseconds ms) = ms
    toNumber :: Number -> Int
    toNumber n = unsafePartial $ fromJust $ fromNumber n

toolUseResult.originalFile:
{-|
Module: Component.App

Root Halogen component for the application.

## Architecture

The App component is the root of our component tree:
- Manages global application state
- Handles routing between views
- Coordinates WebSocket connections
- Manages conversation list

## State Machine

State transitions:
- Loading -> Ready (after fetching conversations)
- Ready -> Connecting (when selecting conversation)
- Connecting -> Connected (WebSocket established)
- Connected -> Ready (on disconnect/switch)

-}

module Component.App where

import Prelude

import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Effect.Aff (Aff)
import Effect.Aff.Class (class MonadAff)
import Halogen as H
import Halogen.HTML as HH
import Halogen.HTML.Events as HE
import Halogen.HTML.Properties as HP
import Web.HTML.Common (ClassName(..))

import Data.Conversation (ConversationId)
import API.Types (ConversationJSON, MessageJSON)
import API.Client as API

-- | Component state
type State =
  { loading :: Boolean
  , conversations :: Array ConversationJSON
  , activeConversation :: Maybe ConversationId
  , messages :: Array MessageJSON
  , error :: Maybe String
  }

-- | Component actions
data Action
  = Initialize
  | LoadConversations
  | SelectConversation ConversationId
  | CreateConversation
  | HandleError String

-- | Component definition
component :: forall query input output m. MonadAff m => H.Component query input output m
component = H.mkComponent
  { initialState
  , render
  , eval: H.mkEval $ H.defaultEval 
      { handleAction = handleAction
      , initialize = Just Initialize
      }
  }

-- | Initial state
initialState :: forall input. input -> State
initialState _ =
  { loading: true
  , conversations: []
  , activeConversation: Nothing
  , messages: []
  , error: Nothing
  }

-- | Render function
render :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
render state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "app") ]
    [ renderSidebar state
    , renderMainContent state
    ]

-- | Render sidebar with conversation list
renderSidebar :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderSidebar state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar-header") ]
        [ HH.h2_ [ HH.text "Conversations" ]
        , HH.button 
            [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-new")
            , HE.onClick \_ -> CreateConversation
            ]
            [ HH.text "+ New Chat" ]
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-list") ]
        (map renderConversationItem state.conversations)
    ]

-- | Render a single conversation item
renderConversationItem :: forall m. ConversationJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderConversationItem conv =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-item")
    , HE.onClick \_ -> SelectConversation conv.id
    ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-icon") ]
        [ HH.text $ case conv.type of
            _ -> "💬"  -- Simplified for now
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-title") ]
        [ HH.text conv.title ]
    ]

-- | Render main content area
renderMainContent :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMainContent state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "main-content") ]
    [ case state.loading of
        true -> renderLoading
        false -> case state.error of
          Just err -> renderError err
          Nothing -> case state.activeConversation of
            Nothing -> renderWelcome
            Just _ -> renderMessages state.messages
    ]

-- | Render loading state
renderLoading :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderLoading =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "loading") ]
    [ HH.text "Loading..." ]

-- | Render error state
renderError :: forall m. String -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderError error =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "error") ]
    [ HH.text $ "Error: " <> error ]

-- | Render welcome screen
renderWelcome :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderWelcome =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "welcome") ]
    [ HH.h1_ [ HH.text "Welcome to LLM UX" ]
    , HH.p_ [ HH.text "Select a conversation or create a new one to get started." ]
    ]

-- | Render messages
renderMessages :: forall m. Array MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessages messages =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "messages") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-list") ]
        (map renderMessage messages)
    , renderMessageInput
    ]

-- | Render a single message
renderMessage :: forall m. MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessage msg =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-author") ]
        [ HH.text msg.authorId ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-content") ]
        [ HH.text msg.content ]
    ]

-- | Render message input
renderMessageInput :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessageInput =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-input") ]
    [ HH.input 
        [ HP.type_ HP.InputText
        , HP.placeholder "Type a message..."
        , HP.class_ (ClassName "input-field")
        ]
    , HH.button 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-send") ]
        [ HH.text "Send" ]
    ]

-- | Handle actions
handleAction :: forall output m. MonadAff m => Action -> H.HalogenM State Action () output m Unit
handleAction = case _ of
  Initialize -> do
    handleAction LoadConversations

  LoadConversations -> do
    H.modify_ _ { loading = true, error = Nothing }
    result <- H.liftAff $ API.listConversations API.defaultConfig
    case result of
      Left err -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , error = Just $ show err
          }
      Right response -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , conversations = response.conversations
          , error = Nothing
          }

  SelectConversation convId -> do
    H.modify_ _ { activeConversation = Just convId }
    -- TODO: Load messages for conversation

  CreateConversation -> do
    -- TODO: Implement conversation creation
    pure unit

  HandleError err -> do
    H.modify_ _ { error = Just err }

{-|
Module: Component.App

Root Halogen component for the application.

## Architecture

The App component is the root of our component tree:
- Manages global application state
- Handles routing between views
- Coordinates WebSocket connections
- Manages conversation list

## State Machine

State transitions:
- Loading -> Ready (after fetching conversations)
- Ready -> Connecting (when selecting conversation)
- Connecting -> Connected (WebSocket established)
- Connected -> Ready (on disconnect/switch)

-}

module Component.App where

import Prelude

import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Effect.Aff.Class (class MonadAff)
import Effect.Class (liftEffect)
import Halogen as H
import Halogen.HTML as HH
import Halogen.HTML.Events as HE
import Halogen.HTML.Properties as HP
import Halogen.Query.Event (eventListener)
import Halogen.Subscription as HS
import Web.HTML.Common (ClassName(..))

import Data.Conversation (ConversationId)
import API.Types (ConversationJSON, MessageJSON, WSServerMessage(..), AddMessageRequest)
import API.Client as API
import API.WebSocket as WS

-- | Component state
type State =
  { loading :: Boolean
  , conversations :: Array ConversationJSON
  , activeConversation :: Maybe ConversationId
  , messages :: Array MessageJSON
  , error :: Maybe String
  }

-- | Component actions
data Action
  = Initialize
  | LoadConversations
  | SelectConversation ConversationId
  | CreateConversation
  | HandleError String

-- | Component definition
component :: forall query input output m. MonadAff m => H.Component query input output m
component = H.mkComponent
  { initialState
  , render
  , eval: H.mkEval $ H.defaultEval 
      { handleAction = handleAction
      , initialize = Just Initialize
      }
  }

-- | Initial state
initialState :: forall input. input -> State
initialState _ =
  { loading: true
  , conversations: []
  , activeConversation: Nothing
  , messages: []
  , error: Nothing
  }

-- | Render function
render :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
render state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "app") ]
    [ renderSidebar state
    , renderMainContent state
    ]

-- | Render sidebar with conversation list
renderSidebar :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderSidebar state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar-header") ]
        [ HH.h2_ [ HH.text "Conversations" ]
        , HH.button 
            [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-new")
            , HE.onClick \_ -> CreateConversation
            ]
            [ HH.text "+ New Chat" ]
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-list") ]
        (map renderConversationItem state.conversations)
    ]

-- | Render a single conversation item
renderConversationItem :: forall m. ConversationJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderConversationItem conv =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-item")
    , HE.onClick \_ -> SelectConversation conv.id
    ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-icon") ]
        [ HH.text $ case conv.type of
            _ -> "💬"  -- Simplified for now
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-title") ]
        [ HH.text conv.title ]
    ]

-- | Render main content area
renderMainContent :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMainContent state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "main-content") ]
    [ case state.loading of
        true -> renderLoading
        false -> case state.error of
          Just err -> renderError err
          Nothing -> case state.activeConversation of
            Nothing -> renderWelcome
            Just _ -> renderMessages state.messages
    ]

-- | Render loading state
renderLoading :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderLoading =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "loading") ]
    [ HH.text "Loading..." ]

-- | Render error state
renderError :: forall m. String -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderError error =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "error") ]
    [ HH.text $ "Error: " <> error ]

-- | Render welcome screen
renderWelcome :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderWelcome =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "welcome") ]
    [ HH.h1_ [ HH.text "Welcome to LLM UX" ]
    , HH.p_ [ HH.text "Select a conversation or create a new one to get started." ]
    ]

-- | Render messages
renderMessages :: forall m. Array MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessages messages =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "messages") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-list") ]
        (map renderMessage messages)
    , renderMessageInput
    ]

-- | Render a single message
renderMessage :: forall m. MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessage msg =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-author") ]
        [ HH.text msg.authorId ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-content") ]
        [ HH.text msg.content ]
    ]

-- | Render message input
renderMessageInput :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessageInput =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-input") ]
    [ HH.input 
        [ HP.type_ HP.InputText
        , HP.placeholder "Type a message..."
        , HP.class_ (ClassName "input-field")
        ]
    , HH.button 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-send") ]
        [ HH.text "Send" ]
    ]

-- | Handle actions
handleAction :: forall output m. MonadAff m => Action -> H.HalogenM State Action () output m Unit
handleAction = case _ of
  Initialize -> do
    handleAction LoadConversations

  LoadConversations -> do
    H.modify_ _ { loading = true, error = Nothing }
    result <- H.liftAff $ API.listConversations API.defaultConfig
    case result of
      Left err -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , error = Just $ show err
          }
      Right response -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , conversations = response.conversations
          , error = Nothing
          }

  SelectConversation convId -> do
    H.modify_ _ { activeConversation = Just convId }
    -- TODO: Load messages for conversation

  CreateConversation -> do
    -- TODO: Implement conversation creation
    pure unit

  HandleError err -> do
    H.modify_ _ { error = Just err }

{-|
Module: Component.App

Root Halogen component for the application.

## Architecture

The App component is the root of our component tree:
- Manages global application state
- Handles routing between views
- Coordinates WebSocket connections
- Manages conversation list

## State Machine

State transitions:
- Loading -> Ready (after fetching conversations)
- Ready -> Connecting (when selecting conversation)
- Connecting -> Connected (WebSocket established)
- Connected -> Ready (on disconnect/switch)

-}

module Component.App where

import Prelude

import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Effect.Aff.Class (class MonadAff)
import Effect.Class (liftEffect)
import Halogen as H
import Halogen.HTML as HH
import Halogen.HTML.Events as HE
import Halogen.HTML.Properties as HP
import Halogen.Query.Event (eventListener)
import Halogen.Subscription as HS
import Web.HTML.Common (ClassName(..))

import Data.Conversation (ConversationId)
import API.Types (ConversationJSON, MessageJSON, WSServerMessage(..), AddMessageRequest)
import API.Client as API
import API.WebSocket as WS

-- | Component state
type State =
  { loading :: Boolean
  , conversations :: Array ConversationJSON
  , activeConversation :: Maybe ConversationId
  , messages :: Array MessageJSON
  , error :: Maybe String
  , wsConnection :: Maybe WS.WSConnection
  , messageInput :: String
  , currentUserId :: String  -- hardcoded for now
  }

-- | Component actions
data Action
  = Initialize
  | LoadConversations
  | SelectConversation ConversationId
  | CreateConversation
  | HandleError String
  | HandleWSMessage WSServerMessage
  | UpdateMessageInput String
  | SendMessage
  | ConnectWebSocket ConversationId
  | DisconnectWebSocket

-- | Component definition
component :: forall query input output m. MonadAff m => H.Component query input output m
component = H.mkComponent
  { initialState
  , render
  , eval: H.mkEval $ H.defaultEval 
      { handleAction = handleAction
      , initialize = Just Initialize
      }
  }

-- | Initial state
initialState :: forall input. input -> State
initialState _ =
  { loading: true
  , conversations: []
  , activeConversation: Nothing
  , messages: []
  , error: Nothing
  , wsConnection: Nothing
  , messageInput: ""
  , currentUserId: "user-1"  -- hardcoded for now
  }

-- | Render function
render :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
render state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "app") ]
    [ renderSidebar state
    , renderMainContent state
    ]

-- | Render sidebar with conversation list
renderSidebar :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderSidebar state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar-header") ]
        [ HH.h2_ [ HH.text "Conversations" ]
        , HH.button 
            [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-new")
            , HE.onClick \_ -> CreateConversation
            ]
            [ HH.text "+ New Chat" ]
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-list") ]
        (map renderConversationItem state.conversations)
    ]

-- | Render a single conversation item
renderConversationItem :: forall m. ConversationJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderConversationItem conv =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-item")
    , HE.onClick \_ -> SelectConversation conv.id
    ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-icon") ]
        [ HH.text $ case conv.type of
            _ -> "💬"  -- Simplified for now
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-title") ]
        [ HH.text conv.title ]
    ]

-- | Render main content area
renderMainContent :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMainContent state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "main-content") ]
    [ case state.loading of
        true -> renderLoading
        false -> case state.error of
          Just err -> renderError err
          Nothing -> case state.activeConversation of
            Nothing -> renderWelcome
            Just _ -> renderMessages state.messages
    ]

-- | Render loading state
renderLoading :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderLoading =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "loading") ]
    [ HH.text "Loading..." ]

-- | Render error state
renderError :: forall m. String -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderError error =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "error") ]
    [ HH.text $ "Error: " <> error ]

-- | Render welcome screen
renderWelcome :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderWelcome =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "welcome") ]
    [ HH.h1_ [ HH.text "Welcome to LLM UX" ]
    , HH.p_ [ HH.text "Select a conversation or create a new one to get started." ]
    ]

-- | Render messages
renderMessages :: forall m. Array MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessages messages =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "messages") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-list") ]
        (map renderMessage messages)
    , renderMessageInput
    ]

-- | Render a single message
renderMessage :: forall m. MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessage msg =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-author") ]
        [ HH.text msg.authorId ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-content") ]
        [ HH.text msg.content ]
    ]

-- | Render message input
renderMessageInput :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessageInput =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-input") ]
    [ HH.input 
        [ HP.type_ HP.InputText
        , HP.placeholder "Type a message..."
        , HP.class_ (ClassName "input-field")
        ]
    , HH.button 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-send") ]
        [ HH.text "Send" ]
    ]

-- | Handle actions
handleAction :: forall output m. MonadAff m => Action -> H.HalogenM State Action () output m Unit
handleAction = case _ of
  Initialize -> do
    handleAction LoadConversations

  LoadConversations -> do
    H.modify_ _ { loading = true, error = Nothing }
    result <- H.liftAff $ API.listConversations API.defaultConfig
    case result of
      Left err -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , error = Just $ show err
          }
      Right response -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , conversations = response.conversations
          , error = Nothing
          }

  SelectConversation convId -> do
    H.modify_ _ { activeConversation = Just convId }
    -- TODO: Load messages for conversation

  CreateConversation -> do
    -- TODO: Implement conversation creation
    pure unit

  HandleError err -> do
    H.modify_ _ { error = Just err }

toolUseResult.originalFile:
{-|
Module: Component.App

Root Halogen component for the application.

## Architecture

The App component is the root of our component tree:
- Manages global application state
- Handles routing between views
- Coordinates WebSocket connections
- Manages conversation list

## State Machine

State transitions:
- Loading -> Ready (after fetching conversations)
- Ready -> Connecting (when selecting conversation)
- Connecting -> Connected (WebSocket established)
- Connected -> Ready (on disconnect/switch)

-}

module Component.App where

import Prelude

import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Effect.Aff.Class (class MonadAff)
import Effect.Class (liftEffect)
import Halogen as H
import Halogen.HTML as HH
import Halogen.HTML.Events as HE
import Halogen.HTML.Properties as HP
import Halogen.Query.Event (eventListener)
import Halogen.Subscription as HS
import Web.HTML.Common (ClassName(..))

import Data.Conversation (ConversationId)
import API.Types (ConversationJSON, MessageJSON, WSServerMessage(..), AddMessageRequest)
import API.Client as API
import API.WebSocket as WS

-- | Component state
type State =
  { loading :: Boolean
  , conversations :: Array ConversationJSON
  , activeConversation :: Maybe ConversationId
  , messages :: Array MessageJSON
  , error :: Maybe String
  , wsConnection :: Maybe WS.WSConnection
  , messageInput :: String
  , currentUserId :: String  -- hardcoded for now
  }

-- | Component actions
data Action
  = Initialize
  | LoadConversations
  | SelectConversation ConversationId
  | CreateConversation
  | HandleError String
  | HandleWSMessage WSServerMessage
  | UpdateMessageInput String
  | SendMessage
  | ConnectWebSocket ConversationId
  | DisconnectWebSocket

-- | Component definition
component :: forall query input output m. MonadAff m => H.Component query input output m
component = H.mkComponent
  { initialState
  , render
  , eval: H.mkEval $ H.defaultEval 
      { handleAction = handleAction
      , initialize = Just Initialize
      }
  }

-- | Initial state
initialState :: forall input. input -> State
initialState _ =
  { loading: true
  , conversations: []
  , activeConversation: Nothing
  , messages: []
  , error: Nothing
  , wsConnection: Nothing
  , messageInput: ""
  , currentUserId: "user-1"  -- hardcoded for now
  }

-- | Render function
render :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
render state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "app") ]
    [ renderSidebar state
    , renderMainContent state
    ]

-- | Render sidebar with conversation list
renderSidebar :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderSidebar state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar-header") ]
        [ HH.h2_ [ HH.text "Conversations" ]
        , HH.button 
            [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-new")
            , HE.onClick \_ -> CreateConversation
            ]
            [ HH.text "+ New Chat" ]
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-list") ]
        (map renderConversationItem state.conversations)
    ]

-- | Render a single conversation item
renderConversationItem :: forall m. ConversationJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderConversationItem conv =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-item")
    , HE.onClick \_ -> SelectConversation conv.id
    ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-icon") ]
        [ HH.text $ case conv.type of
            _ -> "💬"  -- Simplified for now
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-title") ]
        [ HH.text conv.title ]
    ]

-- | Render main content area
renderMainContent :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMainContent state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "main-content") ]
    [ case state.loading of
        true -> renderLoading
        false -> case state.error of
          Just err -> renderError err
          Nothing -> case state.activeConversation of
            Nothing -> renderWelcome
            Just _ -> renderMessages state.messages
    ]

-- | Render loading state
renderLoading :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderLoading =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "loading") ]
    [ HH.text "Loading..." ]

-- | Render error state
renderError :: forall m. String -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderError error =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "error") ]
    [ HH.text $ "Error: " <> error ]

-- | Render welcome screen
renderWelcome :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderWelcome =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "welcome") ]
    [ HH.h1_ [ HH.text "Welcome to LLM UX" ]
    , HH.p_ [ HH.text "Select a conversation or create a new one to get started." ]
    ]

-- | Render messages
renderMessages :: forall m. State -> Array MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessages state messages =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "messages") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-list") ]
        (map renderMessage messages)
    , renderMessageInput state
    ]

-- | Render a single message
renderMessage :: forall m. MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessage msg =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-author") ]
        [ HH.text msg.authorId ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-content") ]
        [ HH.text msg.content ]
    ]

-- | Render message input
renderMessageInput :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessageInput state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-input") ]
    [ HH.input 
        [ HP.type_ HP.InputText
        , HP.placeholder "Type a message..."
        , HP.class_ (ClassName "input-field")
        , HP.value state.messageInput
        , HE.onValueInput UpdateMessageInput
        ]
    , HH.button 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-send")
        , HE.onClick \_ -> SendMessage
        ]
        [ HH.text "Send" ]
    ]

-- | Handle actions
handleAction :: forall output m. MonadAff m => Action -> H.HalogenM State Action () output m Unit
handleAction = case _ of
  Initialize -> do
    handleAction LoadConversations

  LoadConversations -> do
    H.modify_ _ { loading = true, error = Nothing }
    result <- H.liftAff $ API.listConversations API.defaultConfig
    case result of
      Left err -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , error = Just $ show err
          }
      Right response -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , conversations = response.conversations
          , error = Nothing
          }

  SelectConversation convId -> do
    H.modify_ _ { activeConversation = Just convId }
    -- TODO: Load messages for conversation

  CreateConversation -> do
    -- TODO: Implement conversation creation
    pure unit

  HandleError err -> do
    H.modify_ _ { error = Just err }

content.text: Now implement the WebSocket handlers:

input.old_string:
SelectConversation convId -> do
    H.modify_ _ { activeConversation = Just convId }

  CreateConversation -> do
    -- TODO: Implement conversation creation

input.new_string:
SelectConversation convId -> do
    -- Disconnect from current conversation
    state <- H.get
    case state.wsConnection of
      Just conn -> liftEffect $ WS.disconnect conn
      Nothing -> pure unit
    
    H.modify_ _ { activeConversation = Just convId, wsConnection = Nothing }
    
    -- Load messages for conversation
    result <- H.liftAff $ API.getMessages API.defaultConfig convId Nothing Nothing
    case result of
      Left err -> handleAction $ HandleError $ show err
      Right response -> do
        H.modify_ _ { messages = response.messages }
        -- Connect WebSocket
        handleAction $ ConnectWebSocket convId

  CreateConversation -> do
    -- TODO: Implement conversation creation
    pure unit

  ConnectWebSocket convId -> do
    conn <- H.liftAff $ WS.connect WS.defaultWSConfig convId
    
    -- Set up message handler
    _ <- H.subscribe =<< liftEffect do
      emitter <- HS.create
      WS.onMessage conn \msg -> HS.notify emitter.listener (HandleWSMessage msg)
      pure emitter.emitter
    
    H.modify_ _ { wsConnection = Just conn }

  DisconnectWebSocket -> do
    state <- H.get
    case state.wsConnection of
      Just conn -> liftEffect $ WS.disconnect conn
      Nothing -> pure unit
    H.modify_ _ { wsConnection = Nothing }

  HandleWSMessage msg -> case msg of
    WSMessageBroadcast newMsg -> do
      H.modify_ \st -> st { messages = st.messages <> [newMsg] }
    WSError errMsg -> do
      handleAction $ HandleError errMsg
    _ -> pure unit

  UpdateMessageInput text -> do
    H.modify_ _ { messageInput = text }

  SendMessage -> do
    state <- H.get
    case state.wsConnection, state.activeConversation of
      Just conn, Just convId -> do
        let request = 
              { authorId: state.currentUserId
              , content: state.messageInput
              , leafId: Nothing
              }
        liftEffect $ WS.send conn (WSSendMessage request)
        H.modify_ _ { messageInput = "" }
      _, _ -> pure unit

  HandleError err -> do
    H.modify_ _ { error = Just err }

{-|
Module: Component.App

Root Halogen component for the application.

## Architecture

The App component is the root of our component tree:
- Manages global application state
- Handles routing between views

  | LoadConversations
  | SelectConversation ConversationId
  | CreateConversation
  | HandleError String
  | HandleWSMessage WSServerMessage
  | UpdateMessageInput String
  | SendMessage
  | ConnectWebSocket ConversationId
  | DisconnectWebSocket

-- | Component definition
component :: forall query input output m. MonadAff m => H.Component query input output m
component = H.mkComponent
  { initialState
  , render
  , eval: H.mkEval $ H.defaultEval 
      { handleAction = handleAction
      , initialize = Just Initialize
      }
  }

-- | Initial state
initialState :: forall input. input -> State
initialState _ =
  { loading: true
  , conversations: []
  , activeConversation: Nothing
  , messages: []
  , error: Nothing
  , wsConnection: Nothing
  , messageInput: ""
  , currentUserId: "user-1"  -- hardcoded for now
  }

-- | Render function
render :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
render state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "app") ]
    [ renderSidebar state
    , renderMainContent state
    ]

-- | Render sidebar with conversation list
renderSidebar :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderSidebar state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar-header") ]
        [ HH.h2_ [ HH.text "Conversations" ]
        , HH.button 
            [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-new")
            , HE.onClick \_ -> CreateConversation
            ]
            [ HH.text "+ New Chat" ]
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-list") ]
        (map renderConversationItem state.conversations)
    ]

-- | Render a single conversation item
renderConversationItem :: forall m. ConversationJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderConversationItem conv =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-item")
    , HE.onClick \_ -> SelectConversation conv.id
    ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-icon") ]
        [ HH.text $ case conv.type of
            _ -> "💬"  -- Simplified for now
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-title") ]
        [ HH.text conv.title ]
    ]

-- | Render main content area
renderMainContent :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMainContent state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "main-content") ]
    [ case state.loading of
        true -> renderLoading
        false -> case state.error of
          Just err -> renderError err
          Nothing -> case state.activeConversation of
            Nothing -> renderWelcome
            Just _ -> renderMessages state state.messages
    ]

-- | Render loading state
renderLoading :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderLoading =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "loading") ]
    [ HH.text "Loading..." ]

-- | Render error state
renderError :: forall m. String -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderError error =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "error") ]
    [ HH.text $ "Error: " <> error ]

-- | Render welcome screen
renderWelcome :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderWelcome =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "welcome") ]
    [ HH.h1_ [ HH.text "Welcome to LLM UX" ]
    , HH.p_ [ HH.text "Select a conversation or create a new one to get started." ]
    ]

-- | Render messages
renderMessages :: forall m. State -> Array MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessages state messages =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "messages") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-list") ]
        (map renderMessage messages)
    , renderMessageInput state
    ]

-- | Render a single message
renderMessage :: forall m. MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessage msg =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-author") ]
        [ HH.text msg.authorId ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-content") ]
        [ HH.text msg.content ]
    ]

-- | Render message input
renderMessageInput :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessageInput state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-input") ]
    [ HH.input 
        [ HP.type_ HP.InputText
        , HP.placeholder "Type a message..."
        , HP.class_ (ClassName "input-field")
        , HP.value state.messageInput
        , HE.onValueInput UpdateMessageInput
        ]
    , HH.button 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-send")
        , HE.onClick \_ -> SendMessage
        ]
        [ HH.text "Send" ]
    ]

-- | Handle actions
handleAction :: forall output m. MonadAff m => Action -> H.HalogenM State Action () output m Unit
handleAction = case _ of
  Initialize -> do
    handleAction LoadConversations

  LoadConversations -> do
    H.modify_ _ { loading = true, error = Nothing }
    result <- H.liftAff $ API.listConversations API.defaultConfig
    case result of
      Left err -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , error = Just $ show err
          }
      Right response -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , conversations = response.conversations
          , error = Nothing
          }

  SelectConversation convId -> do
    -- Disconnect from current conversation
    state <- H.get
    case state.wsConnection of
      Just conn -> liftEffect $ WS.disconnect conn
      Nothing -> pure unit
    
    H.modify_ _ { activeConversation = Just convId, wsConnection = Nothing }
    
    -- Load messages for conversation
    result <- H.liftAff $ API.getMessages API.defaultConfig convId Nothing Nothing
    case result of
      Left err -> handleAction $ HandleError $ show err
      Right response -> do
        H.modify_ _ { messages = response.messages }
        -- Connect WebSocket
        handleAction $ ConnectWebSocket convId

  CreateConversation -> do
    -- TODO: Implement conversation creation
    pure unit

  ConnectWebSocket convId -> do
    conn <- H.liftAff $ WS.connect WS.defaultWSConfig convId
    
    -- Set up message handler
    _ <- H.subscribe =<< liftEffect do
      emitter <- HS.create
      WS.onMessage conn \msg -> HS.notify emitter.listener (HandleWSMessage msg)
      pure emitter.emitter
    
    H.modify_ _ { wsConnection = Just conn }

  DisconnectWebSocket -> do
    state <- H.get
    case state.wsConnection of
      Just conn -> liftEffect $ WS.disconnect conn
      Nothing -> pure unit
    H.modify_ _ { wsConnection = Nothing }

  HandleWSMessage msg -> case msg of
    WSMessageBroadcast newMsg -> do
      H.modify_ \st -> st { messages = st.messages <> [newMsg] }
    WSError errMsg -> do
      handleAction $ HandleError errMsg
    _ -> pure unit

  UpdateMessageInput text -> do
    H.modify_ _ { messageInput = text }

  SendMessage -> do
    state <- H.get
    case state.wsConnection, state.activeConversation of
      Just conn, Just convId -> do
        let request = 
              { authorId: state.currentUserId
              , content: state.messageInput
              , leafId: Nothing
              }
        liftEffect $ WS.send conn (WSSendMessage request)
        H.modify_ _ { messageInput = "" }
      _, _ -> pure unit

  HandleError err -> do
    H.modify_ _ { error = Just err }

-- | Get messages for a conversation
getMessages :: Config -> ConversationId -> Maybe LeafId -> Aff (APIResult GetMessagesResponse)
getMessages config convId maybeLeafId =
  let path = "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/messages" <>
             case maybeLeafId of
               Nothing -> ""
               Just leafId -> "?leaf_id=" <> unLeafId leafId
  in get config path

-- | Add a message to a conversation
addMessage :: Config -> ConversationId -> AddMessageRequest -> Aff (APIResult AddMessageResponse)
addMessage config convId req =
  post config ("/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/messages") req

-- | Update a message
updateMessage :: Config -> ConversationId -> MessageId -> UpdateMessageRequest -> Aff (APIResult UpdateMessageResponse)
updateMessage config convId msgId req =
  put config ("/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/messages/" <> unMessageId msgId) req

-- | Delete a message (and all following messages)
deleteMessage :: Config -> ConversationId -> MessageId -> Aff (APIResult DeleteMessageResponse)
deleteMessage config convId msgId =
  delete config $ "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/messages/" <> unMessageId msgId

-- | Get all leaves/branches for a conversation
getLeaves :: Config -> ConversationId -> Aff (APIResult GetLeavesResponse)
getLeaves config convId =
  get config $ "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/leaves"

-- | Create a new leaf/branch

{-|
Module: Component.App

Root Halogen component for the application.

## Architecture

The App component is the root of our component tree:
- Manages global application state
- Handles routing between views
- Coordinates WebSocket connections
- Manages conversation list

## State Machine

State transitions:
- Loading -> Ready (after fetching conversations)
- Ready -> Connecting (when selecting conversation)
- Connecting -> Connected (WebSocket established)
- Connected -> Ready (on disconnect/switch)

-}

module Component.App where

import Prelude

import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Effect.Aff.Class (class MonadAff)
import Effect.Class (liftEffect)
import Halogen as H
import Halogen.HTML as HH
import Halogen.HTML.Events as HE
import Halogen.HTML.Properties as HP
import Halogen.Query.Event (eventListener)
import Halogen.Subscription as HS
import Web.HTML.Common (ClassName(..))

import Data.Conversation (ConversationId)
import API.Types (ConversationJSON, MessageJSON, WSServerMessage(..), WSClientMessage(..), AddMessageRequest)
import API.Client as API
import API.WebSocket as WS

-- | Component state
type State =
  { loading :: Boolean
  , conversations :: Array ConversationJSON
  , activeConversation :: Maybe ConversationId
  , messages :: Array MessageJSON
  , error :: Maybe String
  , wsConnection :: Maybe WS.WSConnection
  , messageInput :: String
  , currentUserId :: String  -- hardcoded for now
  }

-- | Component actions
data Action
  = Initialize
  | LoadConversations
  | SelectConversation ConversationId
  | CreateConversation
  | HandleError String
  | HandleWSMessage WSServerMessage
  | UpdateMessageInput String
  | SendMessage
  | ConnectWebSocket ConversationId
  | DisconnectWebSocket

-- | Component definition
component :: forall query input output m. MonadAff m => H.Component query input output m
component = H.mkComponent
  { initialState
  , render
  , eval: H.mkEval $ H.defaultEval 
      { handleAction = handleAction
      , initialize = Just Initialize
      }
  }

-- | Initial state
initialState :: forall input. input -> State
initialState _ =
  { loading: true
  , conversations: []
  , activeConversation: Nothing
  , messages: []
  , error: Nothing
  , wsConnection: Nothing
  , messageInput: ""
  , currentUserId: "user-1"  -- hardcoded for now
  }

-- | Render function
render :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
render state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "app") ]
    [ renderSidebar state
    , renderMainContent state
    ]

-- | Render sidebar with conversation list
renderSidebar :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderSidebar state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "sidebar-header") ]
        [ HH.h2_ [ HH.text "Conversations" ]
        , HH.button 
            [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-new")
            , HE.onClick \_ -> CreateConversation
            ]
            [ HH.text "+ New Chat" ]
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-list") ]
        (map renderConversationItem state.conversations)
    ]

-- | Render a single conversation item
renderConversationItem :: forall m. ConversationJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderConversationItem conv =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-item")
    , HE.onClick \_ -> SelectConversation conv.id
    ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-icon") ]
        [ HH.text $ case conv.type of
            _ -> "💬"  -- Simplified for now
        ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "conversation-title") ]
        [ HH.text conv.title ]
    ]

-- | Render main content area
renderMainContent :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMainContent state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "main-content") ]
    [ case state.loading of
        true -> renderLoading
        false -> case state.error of
          Just err -> renderError err
          Nothing -> case state.activeConversation of
            Nothing -> renderWelcome
            Just _ -> renderMessages state state.messages
    ]

-- | Render loading state
renderLoading :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderLoading =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "loading") ]
    [ HH.text "Loading..." ]

-- | Render error state
renderError :: forall m. String -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderError error =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "error") ]
    [ HH.text $ "Error: " <> error ]

-- | Render welcome screen
renderWelcome :: forall m. H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderWelcome =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "welcome") ]
    [ HH.h1_ [ HH.text "Welcome to LLM UX" ]
    , HH.p_ [ HH.text "Select a conversation or create a new one to get started." ]
    ]

-- | Render messages
renderMessages :: forall m. State -> Array MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessages state messages =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "messages") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-list") ]
        (map renderMessage messages)
    , renderMessageInput state
    ]

-- | Render a single message
renderMessage :: forall m. MessageJSON -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessage msg =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message") ]
    [ HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-author") ]
        [ HH.text msg.authorId ]
    , HH.div 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-content") ]
        [ HH.text msg.content ]
    ]

-- | Render message input
renderMessageInput :: forall m. State -> H.ComponentHTML Action () m
renderMessageInput state =
  HH.div 
    [ HP.class_ (ClassName "message-input") ]
    [ HH.input 
        [ HP.type_ HP.InputText
        , HP.placeholder "Type a message..."
        , HP.class_ (ClassName "input-field")
        , HP.value state.messageInput
        , HE.onValueInput UpdateMessageInput
        ]
    , HH.button 
        [ HP.class_ (ClassName "btn-send")
        , HE.onClick \_ -> SendMessage
        ]
        [ HH.text "Send" ]
    ]

-- | Handle actions
handleAction :: forall output m. MonadAff m => Action -> H.HalogenM State Action () output m Unit
handleAction = case _ of
  Initialize -> do
    handleAction LoadConversations

  LoadConversations -> do
    H.modify_ _ { loading = true, error = Nothing }
    result <- H.liftAff $ API.listConversations API.defaultConfig
    case result of
      Left err -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , error = Just $ show err
          }
      Right response -> do
        H.modify_ _ 
          { loading = false
          , conversations = response.conversations
          , error = Nothing
          }

  SelectConversation convId -> do
    -- Disconnect from current conversation
    state <- H.get
    case state.wsConnection of
      Just conn -> liftEffect $ WS.disconnect conn
      Nothing -> pure unit
    
    H.modify_ _ { activeConversation = Just convId, wsConnection = Nothing }
    
    -- Load messages for conversation
    result <- H.liftAff $ API.getMessages API.defaultConfig convId Nothing Nothing
    case result of
      Left err -> handleAction $ HandleError $ show err
      Right response -> do
        H.modify_ _ { messages = response.messages }
        -- Connect WebSocket
        handleAction $ ConnectWebSocket convId

  CreateConversation -> do
    -- TODO: Implement conversation creation
    pure unit

  ConnectWebSocket convId -> do
    conn <- H.liftAff $ WS.connect WS.defaultWSConfig convId
    
    -- Set up message handler
    _ <- H.subscribe =<< liftEffect do
      emitter <- HS.create
      WS.onMessage conn \msg -> HS.notify emitter.listener (HandleWSMessage msg)
      pure emitter.emitter
    
    H.modify_ _ { wsConnection = Just conn }

  DisconnectWebSocket -> do
    state <- H.get
    case state.wsConnection of
      Just conn -> liftEffect $ WS.disconnect conn
      Nothing -> pure unit
    H.modify_ _ { wsConnection = Nothing }

  HandleWSMessage msg -> case msg of
    WSMessageBroadcast newMsg -> do
      H.modify_ \st -> st { messages = st.messages <> [newMsg] }
    WSError errMsg -> do
      handleAction $ HandleError errMsg
    _ -> pure unit

  UpdateMessageInput text -> do
    H.modify_ _ { messageInput = text }

  SendMessage -> do
    state <- H.get
    case state.wsConnection, state.activeConversation of
      Just conn, Just convId -> do
        let request = 
              { authorId: state.currentUserId
              , content: state.messageInput
              , leafId: Nothing
              }
        liftEffect $ WS.send conn (WSSendMessage request)
        H.modify_ _ { messageInput = "" }
      _, _ -> pure unit

  HandleError err -> do
    H.modify_ _ { error = Just err }

encodeCreateLeafRequest :: CreateLeafRequest -> Json
encodeCreateLeafRequest req =
  "name" := req.name
  ~> "branch_from_message_id" := Conv.unMessageId req.branchFromMessageId
  ~> (case req.newContent of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just content -> "new_content" := content ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode SwitchLeafRequest
encodeSwitchLeafRequest :: SwitchLeafRequest -> Json
encodeSwitchLeafRequest req =
  "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId req.leafId
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Decode ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  conversations <- obj .: "conversations" >>= traverse decodeConversation
  total <- obj .: "total"
  pure { conversations, total }

-- | Decode a Conversation
decodeConversation :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ConversationJSON
decodeConversation json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkConversationId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right cid -> pure cid
  title <- obj .: "title"
  typeStr <- obj .: "type"
  convType <- case typeStr of
                "chat" -> pure Conv.Chat
                "wiki" -> pure Conv.Wiki
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown conversation type: " <> typeStr
  participants <- obj .: "participants" >>= traverse decodeParticipant
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  updatedAt <- obj .: "updated_at"
  pure { id, title, type: convType, participants, messages, createdAt, updatedAt }
  where
    decodeParticipant pJson = do
      pObj <- J.decodeJson pJson
      pid <- pObj .: "id"
      ptypeStr <- pObj .: "type"
      ptype <- case ptypeStr of
                "human" -> pure Conv.Human
                "ai" -> pure Conv.AI
