{-|
Module: API.Json

JSON encoding/decoding for API types.

## Design

We need to match the Python backend's JSON format exactly:
- Snake_case field names
- ISO 8601 timestamps
- Nullable fields represented as null (not missing)

-}

module API.Json
  ( encodeCreateConversationRequest
  , encodeUpdateConversationRequest
  , encodeAddMessageRequest
  , encodeUpdateMessageRequest
  , encodeCreateLeafRequest
  , encodeSwitchLeafRequest
  , decodeListConversationsResponse
  , decodeConversation
  , decodeMessage
  , decodeLeaf
  , decodeGetMessagesResponse
  , decodeGetLeavesResponse
  , decodeDeleteResponse
  , decodeSwitchLeafResponse
  ) where

import Prelude

import Data.Argonaut (Json, jsonEmptyObject, (:=), (~>), (.:), (.:?))
import Data.Argonaut as J
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Traversable (traverse)
import Data.DateTime.JSON (DateTimeJSON)

import Data.Conversation as Conv
import Data.Branch as Branch
import API.Types


-- | Encode CreateConversationRequest
encodeCreateConversationRequest :: CreateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeCreateConversationRequest req =
  "title" := req.title
  ~> "type" := (case req.type of
                  Conv.Chat -> "chat"
                  Conv.Wiki -> "wiki")
  ~> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant req.participants)
  ~> jsonEmptyObject
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode UpdateConversationRequest
encodeUpdateConversationRequest :: UpdateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateConversationRequest req =
  let obj = jsonEmptyObject
      obj1 = case req.title of
               Nothing -> obj
               Just t -> "title" := t ~> obj
      obj2 = case req.participants of
               Nothing -> obj1
               Just ps -> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant ps) ~> obj1
  in obj2
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode AddMessageRequest
encodeAddMessageRequest :: AddMessageRequest -> Json
encodeAddMessageRequest req =
  "author_id" := req.authorId
  ~> "content" := req.content
  ~> (case req.leafId of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just lid -> "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId lid ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode UpdateMessageRequest
encodeUpdateMessageRequest :: UpdateMessageRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateMessageRequest req =
  "content" := req.content
  ~> "create_branch" := req.createBranch
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode CreateLeafRequest
encodeCreateLeafRequest :: CreateLeafRequest -> Json
encodeCreateLeafRequest req =
  "name" := req.name
  ~> "branch_from_message_id" := Conv.unMessageId req.branchFromMessageId
  ~> (case req.newContent of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just content -> "new_content" := content ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode SwitchLeafRequest
encodeSwitchLeafRequest :: SwitchLeafRequest -> Json
encodeSwitchLeafRequest req =
  "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId req.leafId
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Decode ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  conversations <- obj .: "conversations" >>= traverse decodeConversation
  total <- obj .: "total"
  pure { conversations, total }

-- | Decode a Conversation
decodeConversation :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ConversationJSON
decodeConversation json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkConversationId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right cid -> pure cid
  title <- obj .: "title"
  typeStr <- obj .: "type"
  convType <- case typeStr of
                "chat" -> pure Conv.Chat
                "wiki" -> pure Conv.Wiki
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown conversation type: " <> typeStr
  participants <- obj .: "participants" >>= traverse decodeParticipant
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  updatedAt <- obj .: "updated_at"
  pure { id, title, type: convType, participants, messages, createdAt, updatedAt }
  where
    decodeParticipant pJson = do
      pObj <- J.decodeJson pJson
      pid <- pObj .: "id"
      ptypeStr <- pObj .: "type"
      ptype <- case ptypeStr of
                "human" -> pure Conv.Human
                "ai" -> pure Conv.AI
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown participant type: " <> ptypeStr
      pname <- pObj .: "name"
      pure { id: pid, type: ptype, name: pname }

-- | Decode a Message
decodeMessage :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError MessageJSON
decodeMessage json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkMessageId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right mid -> pure mid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  authorId <- obj .: "author_id"
  content <- obj .: "content"
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  editedAt <- obj .:? "edited_at"
  pure { id, conversationId, authorId, content, createdAt, editedAt }

-- | Decode a Leaf
decodeLeaf :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError LeafJSON
decodeLeaf json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Branch.mkLeafId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right lid -> pure lid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  name <- obj .: "name"
  parentMessageId <- obj .:? "parent_message_id" >>= traverse \pmidStr ->
    case Conv.mkMessageId pmidStr of
      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
      Right mid -> pure mid
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  messageVersions <- obj .: "message_versions" >>= traverse decodeMessageVersion
  pure { id, conversationId, name, parentMessageId, createdAt, messageVersions }
  where
    decodeMessageVersion mvJson = do
      mvObj <- J.decodeJson mvJson
      midStr <- mvObj .: "message_id"
      messageId <- case Conv.mkMessageId midStr of
                    Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                    Right mid -> pure mid
      lidStr <- mvObj .: "leaf_id"
      leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId lidStr of
                 Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                 Right lid -> pure lid
      content <- mvObj .: "content"
      version <- mvObj .: "version"
      pure { messageId, leafId, content, version }

-- | Decode GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  leafIdStr <- obj .: "leaf_id"
  leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId leafIdStr of
             Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
             Right lid -> pure lid
  hasMore <- obj .: "has_more"
  pure { messages, leafId, hasMore }

-- | Decode GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  leaves <- obj .: "leaves" >>= traverse decodeLeaf
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  pure { leaves, activeLeafId }

-- | Decode a generic delete response
decodeDeleteResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError DeleteConversationResponse
decodeDeleteResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  success <- obj .: "success"
  message <- obj .: "message"
  pure { success, message }

-- | Decode SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  pure { activeLeafId, messages }

{-|
Module: API.Json

JSON encoding/decoding for API types.

## Design

We need to match the Python backend's JSON format exactly:
- Snake_case field names
- ISO 8601 timestamps
- Nullable fields represented as null (not missing)

-}

module API.Json
  ( encodeCreateConversationRequest
  , encodeUpdateConversationRequest
  , encodeAddMessageRequest
  , encodeUpdateMessageRequest
  , encodeCreateLeafRequest
  , encodeSwitchLeafRequest
  , decodeListConversationsResponse
  , decodeConversation
  , decodeMessage
  , decodeLeaf
  , decodeGetMessagesResponse
  , decodeGetLeavesResponse
  , decodeDeleteResponse
  , decodeSwitchLeafResponse
  ) where

import Prelude

import Data.Argonaut (Json, jsonEmptyObject, (:=), (~>), (.:), (.:?))
import Data.Argonaut as J
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Traversable (traverse)
import Data.DateTime.JSON (DateTimeJSON)

import Data.Conversation as Conv
import Data.Branch as Branch
import API.Types


-- | Encode CreateConversationRequest
encodeCreateConversationRequest :: CreateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeCreateConversationRequest req =
  "title" := req.title
  ~> "type" := (case req.type of
                  Conv.Chat -> "chat"
                  Conv.Wiki -> "wiki")
  ~> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant req.participants)
  ~> jsonEmptyObject
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode UpdateConversationRequest
encodeUpdateConversationRequest :: UpdateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateConversationRequest req =
  let obj = jsonEmptyObject
      obj1 = case req.title of
               Nothing -> obj
               Just t -> "title" := t ~> obj
      obj2 = case req.participants of
               Nothing -> obj1
               Just ps -> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant ps) ~> obj1
  in obj2
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode AddMessageRequest
encodeAddMessageRequest :: AddMessageRequest -> Json
encodeAddMessageRequest req =
  "author_id" := req.authorId
  ~> "content" := req.content
  ~> (case req.leafId of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just lid -> "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId lid ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode UpdateMessageRequest
encodeUpdateMessageRequest :: UpdateMessageRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateMessageRequest req =
  "content" := req.content
  ~> "create_branch" := req.createBranch
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode CreateLeafRequest
encodeCreateLeafRequest :: CreateLeafRequest -> Json
encodeCreateLeafRequest req =
  "name" := req.name
  ~> "branch_from_message_id" := Conv.unMessageId req.branchFromMessageId
  ~> (case req.newContent of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just content -> "new_content" := content ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode SwitchLeafRequest
encodeSwitchLeafRequest :: SwitchLeafRequest -> Json
encodeSwitchLeafRequest req =
  "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId req.leafId
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Decode ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  conversations <- obj .: "data" >>= traverse decodeConversation
  -- API doesn't return total, so we calculate it
  let total = Array.length conversations
  pure { conversations, total }

-- | Decode a Conversation
decodeConversation :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ConversationJSON
decodeConversation json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkConversationId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right cid -> pure cid
  title <- obj .: "title"
  typeStr <- obj .: "type"
  convType <- case typeStr of
                "chat" -> pure Conv.Chat
                "wiki" -> pure Conv.Wiki
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown conversation type: " <> typeStr
  participants <- obj .: "participants" >>= traverse decodeParticipant
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  updatedAt <- obj .: "updated_at"
  pure { id, title, type: convType, participants, messages, createdAt, updatedAt }
  where
    decodeParticipant pJson = do
      pObj <- J.decodeJson pJson
      pid <- pObj .: "id"
      ptypeStr <- pObj .: "type"
      ptype <- case ptypeStr of
                "human" -> pure Conv.Human
                "ai" -> pure Conv.AI
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown participant type: " <> ptypeStr
      pname <- pObj .: "name"
      pure { id: pid, type: ptype, name: pname }

-- | Decode a Message
decodeMessage :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError MessageJSON
decodeMessage json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkMessageId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right mid -> pure mid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  authorId <- obj .: "author_id"
  content <- obj .: "content"
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  editedAt <- obj .:? "edited_at"
  pure { id, conversationId, authorId, content, createdAt, editedAt }

-- | Decode a Leaf
decodeLeaf :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError LeafJSON
decodeLeaf json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Branch.mkLeafId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right lid -> pure lid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  name <- obj .: "name"
  parentMessageId <- obj .:? "parent_message_id" >>= traverse \pmidStr ->
    case Conv.mkMessageId pmidStr of
      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
      Right mid -> pure mid
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  messageVersions <- obj .: "message_versions" >>= traverse decodeMessageVersion
  pure { id, conversationId, name, parentMessageId, createdAt, messageVersions }
  where
    decodeMessageVersion mvJson = do
      mvObj <- J.decodeJson mvJson
      midStr <- mvObj .: "message_id"
      messageId <- case Conv.mkMessageId midStr of
                    Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                    Right mid -> pure mid
      lidStr <- mvObj .: "leaf_id"
      leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId lidStr of
                 Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                 Right lid -> pure lid
      content <- mvObj .: "content"
      version <- mvObj .: "version"
      pure { messageId, leafId, content, version }

-- | Decode GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  leafIdStr <- obj .: "leaf_id"
  leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId leafIdStr of
             Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
             Right lid -> pure lid
  hasMore <- obj .: "has_more"
  pure { messages, leafId, hasMore }

-- | Decode GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  leaves <- obj .: "leaves" >>= traverse decodeLeaf
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  pure { leaves, activeLeafId }

-- | Decode a generic delete response
decodeDeleteResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError DeleteConversationResponse
decodeDeleteResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  success <- obj .: "success"
  message <- obj .: "message"
  pure { success, message }

-- | Decode SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  pure { activeLeafId, messages }

      pname <- pObj .: "name"
      pure { id: pid, type: ptype, name: pname }

-- | Decode a Message
decodeMessage :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError MessageJSON
decodeMessage json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkMessageId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right mid -> pure mid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  authorId <- obj .: "author_id"
  content <- obj .: "content"
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  editedAt <- obj .:? "edited_at"
  pure { id, conversationId, authorId, content, createdAt, editedAt }

-- | Decode a Leaf
decodeLeaf :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError LeafJSON
decodeLeaf json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Branch.mkLeafId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right lid -> pure lid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  name <- obj .: "name"
  parentMessageId <- obj .:? "parent_message_id" >>= traverse \pmidStr ->
    case Conv.mkMessageId pmidStr of
      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
      Right mid -> pure mid
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  messageVersions <- obj .: "message_versions" >>= traverse decodeMessageVersion
  pure { id, conversationId, name, parentMessageId, createdAt, messageVersions }
  where
    decodeMessageVersion mvJson = do
      mvObj <- J.decodeJson mvJson
      midStr <- mvObj .: "message_id"
      messageId <- case Conv.mkMessageId midStr of
                    Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                    Right mid -> pure mid
      lidStr <- mvObj .: "leaf_id"
      leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId lidStr of
                 Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                 Right lid -> pure lid
      content <- mvObj .: "content"
      version <- mvObj .: "version"
      pure { messageId, leafId, content, version }

-- | Decode GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  leafIdStr <- obj .: "leaf_id"
  leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId leafIdStr of
             Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
             Right lid -> pure lid
  hasMore <- obj .: "has_more"
  pure { messages, leafId, hasMore }

-- | Decode GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  leaves <- obj .: "leaves" >>= traverse decodeLeaf
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  pure { leaves, activeLeafId }

-- | Decode a generic delete response
decodeDeleteResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError DeleteConversationResponse
decodeDeleteResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  success <- obj .: "success"
  message <- obj .: "message"
  pure { success, message }

-- | Decode SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  pure { activeLeafId, messages }

toolUseResult.originalFile:
{-|
Module: API.Json

JSON encoding/decoding for API types.

## Design

We need to match the Python backend's JSON format exactly:
- Snake_case field names
- ISO 8601 timestamps
- Nullable fields represented as null (not missing)

-}

module API.Json
  ( encodeCreateConversationRequest
  , encodeUpdateConversationRequest
  , encodeAddMessageRequest
  , encodeUpdateMessageRequest
  , encodeCreateLeafRequest
  , encodeSwitchLeafRequest
  , decodeListConversationsResponse
  , decodeConversation
  , decodeMessage
  , decodeLeaf
  , decodeGetMessagesResponse
  , decodeGetLeavesResponse
  , decodeDeleteResponse
  , decodeSwitchLeafResponse
  ) where

import Prelude

import Data.Argonaut (Json, jsonEmptyObject, (:=), (~>), (.:), (.:?))
import Data.Argonaut as J
import Data.Array as Array
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..), fromMaybe)
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Traversable (traverse)
import Data.DateTime.JSON (DateTimeJSON)

import Data.Conversation as Conv
import Data.Branch as Branch
import API.Types


-- | Encode CreateConversationRequest
encodeCreateConversationRequest :: CreateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeCreateConversationRequest req =
  "title" := req.title
  ~> "type" := (case req.type of
                  Conv.Chat -> "chat"
                  Conv.Wiki -> "wiki")
  ~> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant req.participants)
  ~> jsonEmptyObject
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode UpdateConversationRequest
encodeUpdateConversationRequest :: UpdateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateConversationRequest req =
  let obj = jsonEmptyObject
      obj1 = case req.title of
               Nothing -> obj
               Just t -> "title" := t ~> obj
      obj2 = case req.participants of
               Nothing -> obj1
               Just ps -> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant ps) ~> obj1
  in obj2
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode AddMessageRequest
encodeAddMessageRequest :: AddMessageRequest -> Json
encodeAddMessageRequest req =
  "author_id" := req.authorId
  ~> "content" := req.content
  ~> (case req.leafId of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just lid -> "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId lid ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode UpdateMessageRequest
encodeUpdateMessageRequest :: UpdateMessageRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateMessageRequest req =
  "content" := req.content
  ~> "create_branch" := req.createBranch
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode CreateLeafRequest
encodeCreateLeafRequest :: CreateLeafRequest -> Json
encodeCreateLeafRequest req =
  "name" := req.name
  ~> "branch_from_message_id" := Conv.unMessageId req.branchFromMessageId
  ~> (case req.newContent of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just content -> "new_content" := content ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode SwitchLeafRequest
encodeSwitchLeafRequest :: SwitchLeafRequest -> Json
encodeSwitchLeafRequest req =
  "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId req.leafId
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Decode ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  conversations <- obj .: "data" >>= traverse decodeConversation
  -- API doesn't return total, so we calculate it
  let total = Array.length conversations
  pure { conversations, total }

-- | Decode a Conversation
decodeConversation :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ConversationJSON
decodeConversation json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkConversationId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right cid -> pure cid
  title <- obj .: "title"
  typeStr <- obj .: "type"
  convType <- case typeStr of
                "chat" -> pure Conv.Chat
                "wiki" -> pure Conv.Wiki
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown conversation type: " <> typeStr
  participants <- obj .: "participants" >>= traverse decodeParticipant
  messages <- obj .:? "messages" >>= traverse traverse decodeMessage >>= pure <<< fromMaybe []
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  updatedAt <- obj .:? "updated_at"
  pure { id, title, type: convType, participants, messages, createdAt, updatedAt }
  where
    decodeParticipant pJson = do
      pObj <- J.decodeJson pJson
      pid <- pObj .: "id"
      ptypeStr <- pObj .: "type"
      ptype <- case ptypeStr of
                "human" -> pure Conv.Human
                "ai" -> pure Conv.AI
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown participant type: " <> ptypeStr
      pname <- pObj .: "name"
      pure { id: pid, type: ptype, name: pname }

-- | Decode a Message
decodeMessage :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError MessageJSON
decodeMessage json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkMessageId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right mid -> pure mid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  authorId <- obj .: "author_id"
  content <- obj .: "content"
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  editedAt <- obj .:? "edited_at"
  pure { id, conversationId, authorId, content, createdAt, editedAt }

-- | Decode a Leaf
decodeLeaf :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError LeafJSON
decodeLeaf json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Branch.mkLeafId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right lid -> pure lid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  name <- obj .: "name"
  parentMessageId <- obj .:? "parent_message_id" >>= traverse \pmidStr ->
    case Conv.mkMessageId pmidStr of
      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
      Right mid -> pure mid
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  messageVersions <- obj .: "message_versions" >>= traverse decodeMessageVersion
  pure { id, conversationId, name, parentMessageId, createdAt, messageVersions }
  where
    decodeMessageVersion mvJson = do
      mvObj <- J.decodeJson mvJson
      midStr <- mvObj .: "message_id"
      messageId <- case Conv.mkMessageId midStr of
                    Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                    Right mid -> pure mid
      lidStr <- mvObj .: "leaf_id"
      leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId lidStr of
                 Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                 Right lid -> pure lid
      content <- mvObj .: "content"
      version <- mvObj .: "version"
      pure { messageId, leafId, content, version }

-- | Decode GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  leafIdStr <- obj .: "leaf_id"
  leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId leafIdStr of
             Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
             Right lid -> pure lid
  hasMore <- obj .: "has_more"
  pure { messages, leafId, hasMore }

-- | Decode GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  leaves <- obj .: "leaves" >>= traverse decodeLeaf
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  pure { leaves, activeLeafId }

-- | Decode a generic delete response
decodeDeleteResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError DeleteConversationResponse
decodeDeleteResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  success <- obj .: "success"
  message <- obj .: "message"
  pure { success, message }

-- | Decode SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  pure { activeLeafId, messages }

toolUseResult.originalFile:
{-|
Module: API.Types

Types for API requests and responses.

## Algebraic Structure

### API Endpoints
The API forms a typed interface with the backend:
- Each endpoint has a Request type and Response type
- Endpoints form a sum type for exhaustive handling
- Errors are explicitly modeled

### Request/Response Pairs
For each operation O, we have:
- Request_O :: Type (input parameters)
- Response_O :: Type (return value)
- endpoint_O :: Request_O -> Aff (Either APIError Response_O)

### Error Handling
APIError forms a sum type:
- NetworkError String (connection failures)
- HTTPError Int String (status code + message)
- DecodeError String (JSON parsing failures)
- ValidationError String (business logic failures)

## Laws

1. Request Idempotency (for safe methods):
   - GET requests: f(x) = f(f(x))
   - DELETE requests: f(x) followed by f(x) = f(x) followed by error

2. Response Consistency:
   - create(x) followed by get(id(x)) returns x
   - update(id, x) followed by get(id) returns x
   - delete(id) followed by get(id) returns error

3. Error Totality:
   - Every request returns Either APIError Response
   - No exceptions thrown

## Invariants

1. All IDs in responses are valid (non-empty, proper format)
2. Timestamps in responses are valid DateTimes
3. Arrays in responses maintain ordering from server
4. All required fields are present in responses

-}

module API.Types 
  ( APIError(..)
  , APIResult
  -- JSON types
  , ConversationJSON
  , MessageJSON
  , LeafJSON
  , MessageVersionJSON
  -- Conversation endpoints
  , ListConversationsResponse
  , CreateConversationRequest
  , CreateConversationResponse
  , GetConversationResponse
  , UpdateConversationRequest
  , UpdateConversationResponse
  , DeleteConversationResponse
  -- Message endpoints
  , GetMessagesResponse
  , AddMessageRequest
  , AddMessageResponse
  , UpdateMessageRequest
  , UpdateMessageResponse
  , DeleteMessageResponse
  -- Branch endpoints
  , GetLeavesResponse
  , CreateLeafRequest
  , CreateLeafResponse
  , SwitchLeafRequest
  , SwitchLeafResponse
  , DeleteLeafResponse
  -- WebSocket messages
  , WSMessage(..)
  , WSClientMessage(..)
  , WSServerMessage(..)
  ) where

import Prelude

import Data.Argonaut (class DecodeJson, class EncodeJson, JsonDecodeError(..), decodeJson, encodeJson, jsonEmptyObject, (.:), (:=), (~>))
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Data.Conversation (ConversationId, MessageId, ConversationType, Participant)
import Data.Branch (LeafId)
import Data.DateTime.JSON (DateTimeJSON)

-- | Possible API errors
data APIError
  = NetworkError String        -- Connection failed
  | HTTPError Int String        -- HTTP status code + message
  | DecodeError JsonDecodeError -- JSON parsing failed
  | ValidationError String      -- Business logic error

derive instance eqAPIError :: Eq APIError

instance showAPIError :: Show APIError where
  show (NetworkError msg) = "NetworkError: " <> msg
  show (HTTPError code msg) = "HTTPError " <> show code <> ": " <> msg
  show (DecodeError err) = "DecodeError: " <> show err
  show (ValidationError msg) = "ValidationError: " <> msg

-- | Result type for all API calls
type APIResult a = Either APIError a

-- | Response from listing conversations
type ListConversationsResponse = 
  { conversations :: Array ConversationJSON
  , total :: Int
  }

-- JSON version of Conversation with DateTimeJSON
type ConversationJSON = 
  { id :: ConversationId
  , title :: String
  , type :: ConversationType
  , participants :: Array Participant
  , messages :: Array MessageJSON
  , createdAt :: DateTimeJSON
  , updatedAt :: DateTimeJSON
  }

type MessageJSON =
  { id :: MessageId
  , conversationId :: ConversationId
  , authorId :: String
  , content :: String
  , createdAt :: DateTimeJSON
  , editedAt :: Maybe DateTimeJSON
  }

type LeafJSON =
  { id :: LeafId
  , conversationId :: ConversationId
  , name :: String
  , parentMessageId :: Maybe MessageId
  , createdAt :: DateTimeJSON
  , messageVersions :: Array MessageVersionJSON
  }

type MessageVersionJSON =
  { messageId :: MessageId
  , leafId :: LeafId
  , content :: String
  , version :: Int
  }

-- | Request to create a conversation
type CreateConversationRequest =
  { title :: String
  , type :: ConversationType
  , participants :: Array Participant
  }

-- | Response from creating a conversation
type CreateConversationResponse = ConversationJSON

-- | Response from getting a single conversation
type GetConversationResponse = ConversationJSON

-- | Request to update a conversation
type UpdateConversationRequest =
  { title :: Maybe String
  , participants :: Maybe (Array Participant)
  }

-- | Response from updating a conversation
type UpdateConversationResponse = ConversationJSON

-- | Response from deleting a conversation
type DeleteConversationResponse = 
  { success :: Boolean
  , message :: String
  }

-- | Response from getting messages
type GetMessagesResponse =
  { messages :: Array MessageJSON
  , leafId :: LeafId
  , hasMore :: Boolean
  }

-- | Request to add a message
type AddMessageRequest =
  { authorId :: String
  , content :: String
  , leafId :: Maybe LeafId  -- defaults to active leaf
  }

-- | Response from adding a message
type AddMessageResponse = MessageJSON

-- | Request to update a message
type UpdateMessageRequest =
  { content :: String
  , createBranch :: Boolean  -- whether to branch on edit
  }

-- | Response from updating a message
type UpdateMessageResponse = 
  { message :: MessageJSON
  , newLeafId :: Maybe LeafId  -- present if branched
  }

-- | Response from deleting a message
type DeleteMessageResponse =
  { success :: Boolean
  , messagesDeleted :: Int
  }

-- | Response from getting leaves/branches
type GetLeavesResponse =
  { leaves :: Array LeafJSON
  , activeLeafId :: LeafId
  }

-- | Request to create a new leaf/branch
type CreateLeafRequest =
  { name :: String
  , branchFromMessageId :: MessageId
  , newContent :: Maybe String  -- optional new content for the message
  }

-- | Response from creating a leaf
type CreateLeafResponse = LeafJSON

-- | Request to switch active leaf
type SwitchLeafRequest =
  { leafId :: LeafId
  }

-- | Response from switching leaf
type SwitchLeafResponse =
  { activeLeafId :: LeafId
  , messages :: Array MessageJSON
  }

-- | Response from deleting a leaf
type DeleteLeafResponse =
  { success :: Boolean
  , newActiveLeafId :: Maybe LeafId  -- if deleted was active
  }

-- | WebSocket message types
data WSMessage
  = WSClient WSClientMessage
  | WSServer WSServerMessage

-- | Messages from client to server
data WSClientMessage
  = WSConnect ConversationId
  | WSDisconnect
  | WSSendMessage AddMessageRequest
  | WSStartTyping
  | WSStopTyping
  | WSStartEditing MessageId
  | WSStopEditing MessageId
  | WSCursorMove MessageId Int  -- message id and cursor position

derive instance eqWSClientMessage :: Eq WSClientMessage

-- | Messages from server to clients
data WSServerMessage
  = WSConnected 
      { conversationId :: ConversationId
      , activeUsers :: Array String
      }
  | WSMessageBroadcast MessageJSON
  | WSMessageUpdated 
      { messageId :: MessageId
      , content :: String
      , editorId :: String
      }
  | WSMessageDeleted MessageId
  | WSTypingIndicator 
      { userId :: String
      , isTyping :: Boolean
      }
  | WSEditingIndicator
      { userId :: String
      , messageId :: Maybe MessageId  -- Nothing means stopped editing
      }
  | WSUserJoined String
  | WSUserLeft String
  | WSError String
  | WSLeafSwitched LeafId

derive instance eqWSServerMessage :: Eq WSServerMessage

-- | JSON encoding for client messages
instance encodeJsonWSClientMessage :: EncodeJson WSClientMessage where
  encodeJson = case _ of
    WSConnect convId -> 
      "type" := "connect"
      ~> "conversationId" := convId
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSDisconnect ->
      "type" := "disconnect"
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSSendMessage req ->
      "type" := "sendMessage"
      ~> "data" := req
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSStartTyping ->
      "type" := "startTyping"
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSStopTyping ->
      "type" := "stopTyping"
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSStartEditing msgId ->
      "type" := "startEditing"
      ~> "messageId" := msgId
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSStopEditing msgId ->
      "type" := "stopEditing"
      ~> "messageId" := msgId
      ~> jsonEmptyObject
    WSCursorMove msgId pos ->
      "type" := "cursorMove"
      ~> "messageId" := msgId
      ~> "position" := pos
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | JSON decoding for server messages
instance decodeJsonWSServerMessage :: DecodeJson WSServerMessage where
  decodeJson json = do
    obj <- decodeJson json
    msgType <- obj .: "type"
    case msgType of
      "connected" -> do
        data' <- obj .: "data"
        conversationId <- data' .: "conversationId"
        activeUsers <- data' .: "activeUsers"
        pure $ WSConnected { conversationId, activeUsers }
      "messageBroadcast" -> do
        msg <- obj .: "data"
        pure $ WSMessageBroadcast msg
      "messageUpdated" -> do
        data' <- obj .: "data"
        messageId <- data' .: "messageId"
        content <- data' .: "content"
        editorId <- data' .: "editorId"
        pure $ WSMessageUpdated { messageId, content, editorId }
      "messageDeleted" -> do
        msgId <- obj .: "messageId"
        pure $ WSMessageDeleted msgId
      "typingIndicator" -> do
        data' <- obj .: "data"
        userId <- data' .: "userId"
        isTyping <- data' .: "isTyping"
        pure $ WSTypingIndicator { userId, isTyping }
      "editingIndicator" -> do
        data' <- obj .: "data"
        userId <- data' .: "userId"
        messageId <- data' .: "messageId"
        pure $ WSEditingIndicator { userId, messageId }
      "userJoined" -> do
        userId <- obj .: "userId"
        pure $ WSUserJoined userId
      "userLeft" -> do
        userId <- obj .: "userId"
        pure $ WSUserLeft userId
      "error" -> do
        message <- obj .: "message"
        pure $ WSError message
      "leafSwitched" -> do
        leafId <- obj .: "leafId"
        pure $ WSLeafSwitched leafId
      _ -> Left $ TypeMismatch $ "Unknown WebSocket message type: " <> msgType

-- | Make a GET request
get :: forall a. DecodeJson a => Config -> String -> Aff (APIResult a)
get config path = do
  when config.debug $ liftEffect $ log $ "[GET] " <> path
  
  let req = AX.defaultRequest 
        { url = config.baseUrl <> path
        , method = Left GET
        , responseFormat = ResponseFormat.json
        , headers = []
        }
  result <- AX.request req
  
  case result of
    Left err -> 
      pure $ Left $ NetworkError $ AX.printError err
    Right response ->
      case response.status of
        StatusCode code | code >= 200 && code < 300 ->
          case decodeJson response.body of
            Left err -> pure $ Left $ DecodeError err
            Right value -> pure $ Right value
        StatusCode code ->
          pure $ Left $ HTTPError code $ "Request failed with status " <> show code

-- | Make a POST request
post :: forall req res. EncodeJson req => DecodeJson res => Config -> String -> req -> Aff (APIResult res)
post config path body = do
  when config.debug $ liftEffect $ log $ "[POST] " <> path <> " " <> stringify (encodeJson body)

toolUseResult.originalFile:
{-|
Module: API.Json

JSON encoding/decoding for API types.

## Design

We need to match the Python backend's JSON format exactly:
- Snake_case field names
- ISO 8601 timestamps
- Nullable fields represented as null (not missing)

-}

module API.Json
  ( encodeCreateConversationRequest
  , encodeUpdateConversationRequest
  , encodeAddMessageRequest
  , encodeUpdateMessageRequest
  , encodeCreateLeafRequest
  , encodeSwitchLeafRequest
  , decodeListConversationsResponse
  , decodeConversation
  , decodeMessage
  , decodeLeaf
  , decodeGetMessagesResponse
  , decodeGetLeavesResponse
  , decodeDeleteResponse
  , decodeSwitchLeafResponse
  ) where

import Prelude

import Data.Argonaut (Json, jsonEmptyObject, (:=), (~>), (.:), (.:?))
import Data.Argonaut as J
import Data.Array as Array
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..), fromMaybe)
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Traversable (traverse)
import Data.DateTime.JSON (DateTimeJSON)

import Data.Conversation as Conv
import Data.Branch as Branch
import API.Types


-- | Encode CreateConversationRequest
encodeCreateConversationRequest :: CreateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeCreateConversationRequest req =
  "title" := req.title
  ~> "type" := (case req.type of
                  Conv.Chat -> "chat"
                  Conv.Wiki -> "wiki")
  ~> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant req.participants)
  ~> jsonEmptyObject
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode UpdateConversationRequest
encodeUpdateConversationRequest :: UpdateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateConversationRequest req =
  let obj = jsonEmptyObject
      obj1 = case req.title of
               Nothing -> obj
               Just t -> "title" := t ~> obj
      obj2 = case req.participants of
               Nothing -> obj1
               Just ps -> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant ps) ~> obj1
  in obj2
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode AddMessageRequest
encodeAddMessageRequest :: AddMessageRequest -> Json
encodeAddMessageRequest req =
  "author_id" := req.authorId
  ~> "content" := req.content
  ~> (case req.leafId of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just lid -> "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId lid ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode UpdateMessageRequest
encodeUpdateMessageRequest :: UpdateMessageRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateMessageRequest req =
  "content" := req.content
  ~> "create_branch" := req.createBranch
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode CreateLeafRequest
encodeCreateLeafRequest :: CreateLeafRequest -> Json
encodeCreateLeafRequest req =
  "name" := req.name
  ~> "branch_from_message_id" := Conv.unMessageId req.branchFromMessageId
  ~> (case req.newContent of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just content -> "new_content" := content ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode SwitchLeafRequest
encodeSwitchLeafRequest :: SwitchLeafRequest -> Json
encodeSwitchLeafRequest req =
  "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId req.leafId
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Decode ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  conversations <- obj .: "data" >>= traverse decodeConversation
  -- API doesn't return total, so we calculate it
  let total = Array.length conversations
  pure { conversations, total }

-- | Decode a Conversation
decodeConversation :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ConversationJSON
decodeConversation json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkConversationId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right cid -> pure cid
  title <- obj .: "title"
  typeStr <- obj .: "type"
  convType <- case typeStr of
                "chat" -> pure Conv.Chat
                "wiki" -> pure Conv.Wiki
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown conversation type: " <> typeStr
  participants <- obj .: "participants" >>= traverse decodeParticipant
  messagesOpt <- obj .:? "messages"
  messages <- case messagesOpt of
    Nothing -> pure []
    Just msgArray -> traverse decodeMessage msgArray
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  updatedAt <- obj .:? "updated_at"
  pure { id, title, type: convType, participants, messages, createdAt, updatedAt }
  where
    decodeParticipant pJson = do
      pObj <- J.decodeJson pJson
      pid <- pObj .: "id"
      ptypeStr <- pObj .: "type"
      ptype <- case ptypeStr of
                "human" -> pure Conv.Human
                "ai" -> pure Conv.AI
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown participant type: " <> ptypeStr
      pname <- pObj .: "name"
      pure { id: pid, type: ptype, name: pname }

-- | Decode a Message
decodeMessage :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError MessageJSON
decodeMessage json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkMessageId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right mid -> pure mid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  authorId <- obj .: "author_id"
  content <- obj .: "content"
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  editedAt <- obj .:? "edited_at"
  pure { id, conversationId, authorId, content, createdAt, editedAt }

-- | Decode a Leaf
decodeLeaf :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError LeafJSON
decodeLeaf json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Branch.mkLeafId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right lid -> pure lid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  name <- obj .: "name"
  parentMessageId <- obj .:? "parent_message_id" >>= traverse \pmidStr ->
    case Conv.mkMessageId pmidStr of
      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
      Right mid -> pure mid
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  messageVersions <- obj .: "message_versions" >>= traverse decodeMessageVersion
  pure { id, conversationId, name, parentMessageId, createdAt, messageVersions }
  where
    decodeMessageVersion mvJson = do
      mvObj <- J.decodeJson mvJson
      midStr <- mvObj .: "message_id"
      messageId <- case Conv.mkMessageId midStr of
                    Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                    Right mid -> pure mid
      lidStr <- mvObj .: "leaf_id"
      leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId lidStr of
                 Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                 Right lid -> pure lid
      content <- mvObj .: "content"
      version <- mvObj .: "version"
      pure { messageId, leafId, content, version }

decodeGetMessagesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  leafIdStr <- obj .: "leaf_id"
  leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId leafIdStr of

  hasMore <- obj .: "has_more"

{-|
Module: API.Json

JSON encoding/decoding for API types.

## Design

We need to match the Python backend's JSON format exactly:
- Snake_case field names
- ISO 8601 timestamps
- Nullable fields represented as null (not missing)

-}

module API.Json
  ( encodeCreateConversationRequest
  , encodeUpdateConversationRequest
  , encodeAddMessageRequest
  , encodeUpdateMessageRequest
  , encodeCreateLeafRequest
  , encodeSwitchLeafRequest
  , decodeListConversationsResponse
  , decodeConversation
  , decodeMessage
  , decodeLeaf
  , decodeGetMessagesResponse
  , decodeGetLeavesResponse
  , decodeDeleteResponse
  , decodeSwitchLeafResponse
  -- Re-export instances
  , decodeJsonListConversationsResponse
  , decodeJsonConversationJSON
  , decodeJsonMessageJSON
  ) where

import Prelude

import Data.Argonaut (Json, jsonEmptyObject, (:=), (~>), (.:), (.:?))
import Data.Argonaut as J
import Data.Array as Array
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..), fromMaybe)
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Traversable (traverse)
import Data.DateTime.JSON (DateTimeJSON)

import Data.Conversation as Conv
import Data.Branch as Branch
import API.Types


-- | Encode CreateConversationRequest
encodeCreateConversationRequest :: CreateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeCreateConversationRequest req =
  "title" := req.title
  ~> "type" := (case req.type of
                  Conv.Chat -> "chat"
                  Conv.Wiki -> "wiki")
  ~> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant req.participants)
  ~> jsonEmptyObject
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode UpdateConversationRequest
encodeUpdateConversationRequest :: UpdateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateConversationRequest req =
  let obj = jsonEmptyObject
      obj1 = case req.title of
               Nothing -> obj
               Just t -> "title" := t ~> obj
      obj2 = case req.participants of
               Nothing -> obj1
               Just ps -> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant ps) ~> obj1
  in obj2
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode AddMessageRequest
encodeAddMessageRequest :: AddMessageRequest -> Json
encodeAddMessageRequest req =
  "author_id" := req.authorId
  ~> "content" := req.content
  ~> (case req.leafId of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just lid -> "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId lid ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode UpdateMessageRequest
encodeUpdateMessageRequest :: UpdateMessageRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateMessageRequest req =
  "content" := req.content
  ~> "create_branch" := req.createBranch
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode CreateLeafRequest
encodeCreateLeafRequest :: CreateLeafRequest -> Json
encodeCreateLeafRequest req =
  "name" := req.name
  ~> "branch_from_message_id" := Conv.unMessageId req.branchFromMessageId
  ~> (case req.newContent of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just content -> "new_content" := content ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode SwitchLeafRequest
encodeSwitchLeafRequest :: SwitchLeafRequest -> Json
encodeSwitchLeafRequest req =
  "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId req.leafId
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Decode ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  conversations <- obj .: "data" >>= traverse decodeConversation
  -- API doesn't return total, so we calculate it
  let total = Array.length conversations
  pure { conversations, total }

-- | Decode a Conversation
decodeConversation :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ConversationJSON
decodeConversation json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkConversationId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right cid -> pure cid
  title <- obj .: "title"
  typeStr <- obj .: "type"
  convType <- case typeStr of
                "chat" -> pure Conv.Chat
                "wiki" -> pure Conv.Wiki
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown conversation type: " <> typeStr
  participants <- obj .: "participants" >>= traverse decodeParticipant
  messagesOpt <- obj .:? "messages"
  messages <- case messagesOpt of
    Nothing -> pure []
    Just msgArray -> traverse decodeMessage msgArray
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  updatedAt <- obj .:? "updated_at"
  pure { id, title, type: convType, participants, messages, createdAt, updatedAt }
  where
    decodeParticipant pJson = do
      pObj <- J.decodeJson pJson
      pid <- pObj .: "id"
      ptypeStr <- pObj .: "type"
      ptype <- case ptypeStr of
                "human" -> pure Conv.Human
                "ai" -> pure Conv.AI
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown participant type: " <> ptypeStr
      pname <- pObj .: "name"
      pure { id: pid, type: ptype, name: pname }

-- | Decode a Message
decodeMessage :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError MessageJSON
decodeMessage json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkMessageId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right mid -> pure mid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  authorId <- obj .: "author_id"
  content <- obj .: "content"
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  editedAt <- obj .:? "edited_at"
  pure { id, conversationId, authorId, content, createdAt, editedAt }

-- | Decode a Leaf
decodeLeaf :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError LeafJSON
decodeLeaf json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Branch.mkLeafId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right lid -> pure lid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  name <- obj .: "name"
  parentMessageId <- obj .:? "parent_message_id" >>= traverse \pmidStr ->
    case Conv.mkMessageId pmidStr of
      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
      Right mid -> pure mid
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  messageVersions <- obj .: "message_versions" >>= traverse decodeMessageVersion
  pure { id, conversationId, name, parentMessageId, createdAt, messageVersions }
  where
    decodeMessageVersion mvJson = do
      mvObj <- J.decodeJson mvJson
      midStr <- mvObj .: "message_id"
      messageId <- case Conv.mkMessageId midStr of
                    Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                    Right mid -> pure mid
      lidStr <- mvObj .: "leaf_id"
      leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId lidStr of
                 Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                 Right lid -> pure lid
      content <- mvObj .: "content"
      version <- mvObj .: "version"
      pure { messageId, leafId, content, version }

-- | Decode GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  leafIdStr <- obj .: "leaf_id"
  leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId leafIdStr of
             Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
             Right lid -> pure lid
  hasMore <- obj .: "has_more"
  pure { messages, leafId, hasMore }

-- | Decode GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  leaves <- obj .: "leaves" >>= traverse decodeLeaf
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  pure { leaves, activeLeafId }

-- | Decode a generic delete response
decodeDeleteResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError DeleteConversationResponse
decodeDeleteResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  success <- obj .: "success"
  message <- obj .: "message"
  pure { success, message }

-- | Decode SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  pure { activeLeafId, messages }

{-|
Module: API.Client

HTTP client for backend API.

## Algebraic Structure

The client forms a monad transformer stack:
- Aff for async effects
- Either for error handling
- Reader for configuration (base URL)

Each endpoint function has type:
  endpoint :: Request -> Aff (APIResult Response)

## Implementation Strategy

1. Type-safe endpoints using Affjax
2. Automatic JSON encoding/decoding
3. Consistent error handling
4. Request/response logging (in debug mode)

## Invariants

1. All requests include proper headers
2. All responses are validated before returning
3. Network errors are caught and wrapped
4. Base URL is configurable but never null

-}

module API.Client
  ( Config
  , defaultConfig
  -- Conversation endpoints
  , listConversations
  , createConversation
  , getConversation
  , updateConversation
  , deleteConversation
  -- Message endpoints
  , getMessages
  , addMessage
  , updateMessage
  , deleteMessage
  -- Branch endpoints
  , getLeaves
  , createLeaf
  , switchLeaf
  , deleteLeaf
  ) where

import Prelude

import Affjax.Web as AX
import Affjax.RequestBody as RequestBody
import Affjax.RequestHeader (RequestHeader(..))
import Affjax.ResponseFormat as ResponseFormat
import Affjax.StatusCode (StatusCode(..))
import Data.Argonaut (class DecodeJson, class EncodeJson, decodeJson, encodeJson, stringify, printJsonDecodeError)
import Data.Either (Either(..), note)
import Data.HTTP.Method (Method(..))
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..))
import Effect.Aff (Aff)
import Effect.Class (liftEffect)
import Effect.Console (log)

import Data.Conversation (ConversationId, MessageId, unConversationId, unMessageId)
import Data.Branch (LeafId, unLeafId)
import API.Types

-- | API client configuration
type Config =
  { baseUrl :: String
  , debug :: Boolean
  }

-- | Default configuration pointing to local backend
defaultConfig :: Config
defaultConfig =
  { baseUrl: "http://localhost:8000"
  , debug: false
  }

-- | Make a GET request
get :: forall a. DecodeJson a => Config -> String -> Aff (APIResult a)
get config path = do
  when config.debug $ liftEffect $ log $ "[GET] " <> path
  
  let req = AX.defaultRequest 
        { url = config.baseUrl <> path
        , method = Left GET
        , responseFormat = ResponseFormat.json
        , headers = []
        }
  result <- AX.request req
  
  case result of
    Left err -> 
      pure $ Left $ NetworkError $ AX.printError err
    Right response ->
      case response.status of
        StatusCode code | code >= 200 && code < 300 ->
          case decodeJson response.body of
            Left err -> pure $ Left $ DecodeError err
            Right value -> pure $ Right value
        StatusCode code ->
          pure $ Left $ HTTPError code $ "Request failed with status " <> show code

-- | Make a POST request
post :: forall req res. EncodeJson req => DecodeJson res => Config -> String -> req -> Aff (APIResult res)
post config path body = do
  when config.debug $ liftEffect $ log $ "[POST] " <> path <> " " <> stringify (encodeJson body)
  
  let req = AX.defaultRequest 
        { url = config.baseUrl <> path
        , method = Left POST
        , responseFormat = ResponseFormat.json
        , headers = []
        , content = Just $ RequestBody.json $ encodeJson body
        }
  result <- AX.request req
  
  case result of
    Left err -> 
      pure $ Left $ NetworkError $ AX.printError err
    Right response ->
      case response.status of
        StatusCode code | code >= 200 && code < 300 ->
          case decodeJson response.body of
            Left err -> pure $ Left $ DecodeError err
            Right value -> pure $ Right value
        StatusCode code ->
          pure $ Left $ HTTPError code $ "Request failed with status " <> show code

-- | Make a PUT request
put :: forall req res. EncodeJson req => DecodeJson res => Config -> String -> req -> Aff (APIResult res)
put config path body = do
  when config.debug $ liftEffect $ log $ "[PUT] " <> path <> " " <> stringify (encodeJson body)
  
  let req = AX.defaultRequest 
        { url = config.baseUrl <> path
        , method = Left PUT
        , responseFormat = ResponseFormat.json
        , headers = []
        , content = Just $ RequestBody.json $ encodeJson body
        }
  result <- AX.request req
  
  case result of
    Left err -> 
      pure $ Left $ NetworkError $ AX.printError err
    Right response ->
      case response.status of
        StatusCode code | code >= 200 && code < 300 ->
          case decodeJson response.body of
            Left err -> pure $ Left $ DecodeError err
            Right value -> pure $ Right value
        StatusCode code ->
          pure $ Left $ HTTPError code $ "Request failed with status " <> show code

-- | Make a DELETE request
delete :: forall res. DecodeJson res => Config -> String -> Aff (APIResult res)
delete config path = do
  when config.debug $ liftEffect $ log $ "[DELETE] " <> path
  
  let req = AX.defaultRequest 
        { url = config.baseUrl <> path
        , method = Left DELETE
        , responseFormat = ResponseFormat.json
        , headers = []
        }
  result <- AX.request req
  
  case result of
    Left err -> 
      pure $ Left $ NetworkError $ AX.printError err
    Right response ->
      case response.status of
        StatusCode code | code >= 200 && code < 300 ->
          case decodeJson response.body of
            Left err -> pure $ Left $ DecodeError err
            Right value -> pure $ Right value
        StatusCode code ->
          pure $ Left $ HTTPError code $ "Request failed with status " <> show code

-- | List all conversations
listConversations :: Config -> Aff (APIResult ListConversationsResponse)
listConversations config = get config "/v1/conversations"

-- | Create a new conversation
createConversation :: Config -> CreateConversationRequest -> Aff (APIResult CreateConversationResponse)
createConversation config req = post config "/v1/conversations" req

-- | Get a single conversation
getConversation :: Config -> ConversationId -> Aff (APIResult GetConversationResponse)
getConversation config convId = 
  get config $ "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId

-- | Update a conversation
updateConversation :: Config -> ConversationId -> UpdateConversationRequest -> Aff (APIResult UpdateConversationResponse)
updateConversation config convId req =
  put config ("/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId) req

-- | Delete a conversation
deleteConversation :: Config -> ConversationId -> Aff (APIResult DeleteConversationResponse)
deleteConversation config convId =
  delete config $ "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId

-- | Get messages for a conversation
getMessages :: Config -> ConversationId -> Maybe LeafId -> Aff (APIResult GetMessagesResponse)
getMessages config convId maybeLeafId =
  let path = "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/messages" <>
             case maybeLeafId of
               Nothing -> ""
               Just leafId -> "?leaf_id=" <> unLeafId leafId
  in get config path

-- | Add a message to a conversation
addMessage :: Config -> ConversationId -> AddMessageRequest -> Aff (APIResult AddMessageResponse)
addMessage config convId req =
  post config ("/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/messages") req

-- | Update a message
updateMessage :: Config -> ConversationId -> MessageId -> UpdateMessageRequest -> Aff (APIResult UpdateMessageResponse)
updateMessage config convId msgId req =
  put config ("/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/messages/" <> unMessageId msgId) req

-- | Delete a message (and all following messages)
deleteMessage :: Config -> ConversationId -> MessageId -> Aff (APIResult DeleteMessageResponse)
deleteMessage config convId msgId =
  delete config $ "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/messages/" <> unMessageId msgId

-- | Get all leaves/branches for a conversation
getLeaves :: Config -> ConversationId -> Aff (APIResult GetLeavesResponse)
getLeaves config convId =
  get config $ "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/leaves"

-- | Create a new leaf/branch
createLeaf :: Config -> ConversationId -> CreateLeafRequest -> Aff (APIResult CreateLeafResponse)
createLeaf config convId req =
  post config ("/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/leaves") req

-- | Switch active leaf
switchLeaf :: Config -> ConversationId -> SwitchLeafRequest -> Aff (APIResult SwitchLeafResponse)
switchLeaf config convId req =
  put config ("/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/leaves/active") req

-- | Delete a leaf
deleteLeaf :: Config -> ConversationId -> LeafId -> Aff (APIResult DeleteLeafResponse)
deleteLeaf config convId leafId =
  delete config $ "/v1/conversations/" <> unConversationId convId <> "/leaves/" <> unLeafId leafId

{-|
Module: API.Json

JSON encoding/decoding for API types.

## Design

We need to match the Python backend's JSON format exactly:
- Snake_case field names
- ISO 8601 timestamps
- Nullable fields represented as null (not missing)

-}

module API.Json
  ( encodeCreateConversationRequest
  , encodeUpdateConversationRequest
  , encodeAddMessageRequest
  , encodeUpdateMessageRequest
  , encodeCreateLeafRequest
  , encodeSwitchLeafRequest
  , decodeListConversationsResponse
  , decodeConversation
  , decodeMessage
  , decodeLeaf
  , decodeGetMessagesResponse
  , decodeGetLeavesResponse
  , decodeDeleteResponse
  , decodeSwitchLeafResponse
  -- Re-export instances
  , decodeJsonListConversationsResponse
  , decodeJsonConversationJSON
  , decodeJsonMessageJSON
  ) where

import Prelude

import Data.Argonaut (Json, jsonEmptyObject, (:=), (~>), (.:), (.:?))
import Data.Argonaut as J
import Data.Array as Array
import Data.Maybe (Maybe(..), fromMaybe)
import Data.Either (Either(..))
import Data.Traversable (traverse)
import Data.DateTime.JSON (DateTimeJSON)

import Data.Conversation as Conv
import Data.Branch as Branch
import API.Types


-- | Encode CreateConversationRequest
encodeCreateConversationRequest :: CreateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeCreateConversationRequest req =
  "title" := req.title
  ~> "type" := (case req.type of
                  Conv.Chat -> "chat"
                  Conv.Wiki -> "wiki")
  ~> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant req.participants)
  ~> jsonEmptyObject
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode UpdateConversationRequest
encodeUpdateConversationRequest :: UpdateConversationRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateConversationRequest req =
  let obj = jsonEmptyObject
      obj1 = case req.title of
               Nothing -> obj
               Just t -> "title" := t ~> obj
      obj2 = case req.participants of
               Nothing -> obj1
               Just ps -> "participants" := J.fromArray (map encodeParticipant ps) ~> obj1
  in obj2
  where
    encodeParticipant p =
      "id" := p.id
      ~> "type" := (case p.type of
                     Conv.Human -> "human"
                     Conv.AI -> "ai")
      ~> "name" := p.name
      ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode AddMessageRequest
encodeAddMessageRequest :: AddMessageRequest -> Json
encodeAddMessageRequest req =
  "author_id" := req.authorId
  ~> "content" := req.content
  ~> (case req.leafId of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just lid -> "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId lid ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode UpdateMessageRequest
encodeUpdateMessageRequest :: UpdateMessageRequest -> Json
encodeUpdateMessageRequest req =
  "content" := req.content
  ~> "create_branch" := req.createBranch
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Encode CreateLeafRequest
encodeCreateLeafRequest :: CreateLeafRequest -> Json
encodeCreateLeafRequest req =
  "name" := req.name
  ~> "branch_from_message_id" := Conv.unMessageId req.branchFromMessageId
  ~> (case req.newContent of
       Nothing -> jsonEmptyObject
       Just content -> "new_content" := content ~> jsonEmptyObject)

-- | Encode SwitchLeafRequest
encodeSwitchLeafRequest :: SwitchLeafRequest -> Json
encodeSwitchLeafRequest req =
  "leaf_id" := Branch.unLeafId req.leafId
  ~> jsonEmptyObject

-- | Decode ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ListConversationsResponse
decodeListConversationsResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  conversations <- obj .: "data" >>= traverse decodeConversation
  -- API doesn't return total, so we calculate it
  let total = Array.length conversations
  pure { conversations, total }

-- | Decode a Conversation
decodeConversation :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError ConversationJSON
decodeConversation json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkConversationId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right cid -> pure cid
  title <- obj .: "title"
  typeStr <- obj .: "type"
  convType <- case typeStr of
                "chat" -> pure Conv.Chat
                "wiki" -> pure Conv.Wiki
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown conversation type: " <> typeStr
  participants <- obj .: "participants" >>= traverse decodeParticipant
  messagesOpt <- obj .:? "messages"
  messages <- case messagesOpt of
    Nothing -> pure []
    Just msgArray -> traverse decodeMessage msgArray
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  updatedAt <- obj .:? "updated_at"
  pure { id, title, type: convType, participants, messages, createdAt, updatedAt }
  where
    decodeParticipant pJson = do
      pObj <- J.decodeJson pJson
      pid <- pObj .: "id"
      ptypeStr <- pObj .: "type"
      ptype <- case ptypeStr of
                "human" -> pure Conv.Human
                "ai" -> pure Conv.AI
                _ -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch $ "Unknown participant type: " <> ptypeStr
      pname <- pObj .: "name"
      pure { id: pid, type: ptype, name: pname }

-- | Decode a Message
decodeMessage :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError MessageJSON
decodeMessage json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Conv.mkMessageId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right mid -> pure mid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  authorId <- obj .: "author_id"
  content <- obj .: "content"
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  editedAt <- obj .:? "edited_at"
  pure { id, conversationId, authorId, content, createdAt, editedAt }

-- | Decode a Leaf
decodeLeaf :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError LeafJSON
decodeLeaf json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  idStr <- obj .: "id"
  id <- case Branch.mkLeafId idStr of
          Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
          Right lid -> pure lid
  convIdStr <- obj .: "conversation_id"
  conversationId <- case Conv.mkConversationId convIdStr of
                      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                      Right cid -> pure cid
  name <- obj .: "name"
  parentMessageId <- obj .:? "parent_message_id" >>= traverse \pmidStr ->
    case Conv.mkMessageId pmidStr of
      Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
      Right mid -> pure mid
  createdAt <- obj .: "created_at"
  messageVersions <- obj .: "message_versions" >>= traverse decodeMessageVersion
  pure { id, conversationId, name, parentMessageId, createdAt, messageVersions }
  where
    decodeMessageVersion mvJson = do
      mvObj <- J.decodeJson mvJson
      midStr <- mvObj .: "message_id"
      messageId <- case Conv.mkMessageId midStr of
                    Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                    Right mid -> pure mid
      lidStr <- mvObj .: "leaf_id"
      leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId lidStr of
                 Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                 Right lid -> pure lid
      content <- mvObj .: "content"
      version <- mvObj .: "version"
      pure { messageId, leafId, content, version }

-- | Decode GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetMessagesResponse
decodeGetMessagesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  leafIdStr <- obj .: "leaf_id"
  leafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId leafIdStr of
             Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
             Right lid -> pure lid
  hasMore <- obj .: "has_more"
  pure { messages, leafId, hasMore }

-- | Decode GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError GetLeavesResponse
decodeGetLeavesResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  leaves <- obj .: "leaves" >>= traverse decodeLeaf
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  pure { leaves, activeLeafId }

-- | Decode a generic delete response
decodeDeleteResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError DeleteConversationResponse
decodeDeleteResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  success <- obj .: "success"
  message <- obj .: "message"
  pure { success, message }

-- | Decode SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse :: Json -> Either J.JsonDecodeError SwitchLeafResponse
decodeSwitchLeafResponse json = do
  obj <- J.decodeJson json
  activeLeafIdStr <- obj .: "active_leaf_id"
  activeLeafId <- case Branch.mkLeafId activeLeafIdStr of
                   Left err -> Left $ J.TypeMismatch err
                   Right lid -> pure lid
  messages <- obj .: "messages" >>= traverse decodeMessage
  pure { activeLeafId, messages }

-- | DecodeJson instances for API types
instance decodeJsonListConversationsResponse :: J.DecodeJson ListConversationsResponse where
  decodeJson = decodeListConversationsResponse

instance decodeJsonConversationJSON :: J.DecodeJson ConversationJSON where
  decodeJson = decodeConversation

instance decodeJsonMessageJSON :: J.DecodeJson MessageJSON where
  decodeJson = decodeMessage

instance decodeJsonGetMessagesResponse :: J.DecodeJson GetMessagesResponse where
  decodeJson = decodeGetMessagesResponse

instance decodeJsonGetLeavesResponse :: J.DecodeJson GetLeavesResponse where
  decodeJson = decodeGetLeavesResponse

instance decodeJsonDeleteResponse :: J.DecodeJson DeleteConversationResponse where
  decodeJson = decodeDeleteResponse

instance decodeJsonSwitchLeafResponse :: J.DecodeJson SwitchLeafResponse where
  decodeJson = decodeSwitchLeafResponse
